title: Miguel Caño: «La Rioja se encuentra en un momento de revolución»
creator: Tatiana, Ferrandis
content: Nublo se encuentra en Haro (La Rioja), en una imponente casa palacio del siglo XVI restaurada por Santos Bregaña , pamplonés con uno de los premios de diseño más prestigiosos del mundo, el «Sphere», que otorga el Art Directors Club de Nueva York , por el trabajo realizado en Mugaritz . Templo en el que Miguel Caño bebió de la filosofía de Andoni Luis Aduriz. Han pasado ya tres años desde que inauguró el restaurante, cuyas obras paró la pandemia, pero como aquello es agua pasada, enseguida el chef menciona la madurez temprana, que se horneó desde el inicio del proyecto, ya que a los tres meses recibió la estrella Michelin. Con dos Soles Repsol , desde el pasado mes de junio está considerado uno de los cien mejores restaurantes de Europa, según la lista OAD (Opinionated About Dining): «Nos encontramos en un momento de crecimiento gracias a que tenemos un equipo consolidado con una filosofía y un rumbo muy marcado», dice quien apuesta por una cocina de producto trabajado en un horno de leña, una parrilla y en una cocina económica. Es decir, prescinde del uso de gas y electricidad, metodología, que no sólo resalta la pureza de los ingredientes, sino que conecta a los comensales con la esencia de la cocina ancestral: «Intentamos hacer una cierta vanguardia, pero desde la sencillez. La nuestra es una culinaria de reposo, pero sí mantenemos una línea de trabajo firme en la que dejamos nuestra firma en composiciones y platos muy naturistas y novedosos a la vez,...

title: Seputar Fenomena Macet di Gunung, Kok Bisa Terjadi?
content: Niat malah jadi pening. Fenomena sayangnya terus jadi sorotan dari waktu ke waktu, terutama di masa libur panjang. Dengan pengaturan kuota kunjungan, kondisi ini bisa terjadi? Kepala Balai Besar Taman Nasional (BB TNGGP), Adhi Nurul Hadi, menjelaskan bahwa ada beberapa penyebab macet di gunung. Pertama, di beberapa titik sepanjang jalur pendakian, seperti jalur terjal, jalur penyeberangan air panas, dan jalur sempit yang hanya bisa dilewati beberapa orang, antrean mau-tidak mau muncul. "Jalur terjal dan penyebrangan air panas diatur untuk dilalui secara bergiliran demi menjaga keamanan dan kenyamanan pengunjung," katanya melalui pesan pada , Sabtu, 14 September 2024. "Sementara itu, antrean di jalur sempit berpotensi meningkat saat ramai atau terdapat beberapa grup pendaki dengan kecepatan tempuh yang rendah." Advertisement Ia menyambung, jumlah pengunjung bisa mencapai kuota maksimal selama akhir pekan, sehingga jalur pendakian jadi sangat padat. "Ini terutama pada hari Sabtu di mana kelompok pendaki akan berselisih jalur dengan kelompok pendaki yang baru turun dari puncak (berangkat hari Jumat)," ujar Adhi. Di samping itu, ia mengatakan, fenomena macet di gunung juga terjadi karena ada pendaki yang menggunakan jalur ilegal dan tidak melakukan pendaftaran resmi. Senada dengan itu, Humas Taman Nasional Tengger Semeru (TNBTS), Korina Tasya, menegaskan bahwa kondisi macet tidak terjadi setiap hari. Korina berkata, "Macet terjadi hanya pada hari-hari tertentu, terutama saat...

title: Pemerintah Diminta Hati-Hati Susun Regulasi Industri Makanan dan Tembakau
content: Peraturan Pemerintah (PP) Nomor 28 Tahun 2024 yang disusun dengan metode omnibus dan Rancangan Peraturan Menteri Kesehatan (RPMK) menuai banyak polemik. Dua produk regulasi yang mengatur berbagai aspek kesehatan dan non-kesehatan, termasuk pengaturan industri makanan, , dan alat kontrasepsi tersebut menuai kecaman dari berbagai sektor. Advertisement Dari industri makanan dan minuman misalnya, protes keras dilayangkan karena aturan yang muncul justru memperlakukan gula dan susu formula secara tidak adil, bahkan seolah seperti barang haram yang tidak boleh diiklankan dan dipromosikan. Neeraj Chopra finishes second in Diamond League final, misses trophy by 1cm
content: Brussels: Star Indian javelin thrower Neeraj Chopra agonisingly missed the Diamond League crown by just one centimeter as he finished second for the second consecutive year with a throw of 87.86m in the season finale here on Saturday. The 26-year-old Chopra, who had won the DL trophy in 2022 before finishing second last year, achieved his best throw of the day in his third attempt but that was 1cm short of eventual winner Anderson Peters' 87.87m effort. Grenada's Peters, a two-time world champion, produced his best throw of the day in his opening attempt. Julian Weber of Germany was third with 85.97m. Chopra, who added a silver to his Olympic medal tally in Paris following a historic gold at the Tokyo Games, thus ended his season on a high. The Indian javelin throw superstar, who has a personal best of 89.94m and season's best of 89.49m, had a series of 86.82m, 83.49m, 87.86m, 82.04m, 83.30m and 86.46m. The top three led the seven-man field in the same order for the whole competition. Peters will collect a Diamond League trophy and USD 30,000 for emerging as the DL champion this season. Chopra will pocket USD 12,000 for his second-place finish in the grand finale which marked the end of the prestigious Diamond League series after 14 legs, as well as the end of international athletics season. The Haryana lad remained consistent throughout the season, though he won just one international event this season -- Paavo Nurmi Games in Turku, Finland on June 18. He had made the...

title: ओणम का त्योहार लाए खुशियां हजार...इन कोट्स के जरिए अपनों को करें विश
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
content: केरल का सबसे बड़ा त्योहार ओणम बहुत ही धूमधाम के साथ दस दिनों तक सेलिब्रेट किया जाता है. इस दौरान हर दिन की एक अलग खासियत होती है, वहीं दसवें दिन मुख्य ओणम पर्व के साथ इस फेस्टिवल का समापन हो जाता है. इस बार ओणम पर्व 6 सितंबर से शुरू हुआ था और 15 सितंबर 2024 यानी आज इसका समापन है. ओणम पर्व न सिर्फ धार्मिक महत्व रखता है, बल्कि ये फसलों को सेलिब्रेट करने का त्योहार भी होता है. इस खास पर्व को और भी खास बनाने के लिए कुछ कोट्स के जरिए अपनों को विश कर सकते हैं. ओणम को राजा महाबली के आगमन के स्वागत में मनाया जाता है. इसलिए घरों में फूलों की रंगोली बनाने से लेकर दरवाजे पर तोरण लगाने के अलावा स्वादिष्ट व्यंजन भी बनाए जाते हैं और इस त्योहार में मिलजुलकर खुशियां बांटी जाती हैं. तो चलिए देख लेते हैं ओणम के शुभकामना संदेश.

title: Food trends come and go, but food trends as a whole are here to stay
content: Before, during, and after the pandemic, for as long as people have spare time and stable internet, food trends will always crop up Growing up, we were likely told by our parents not to play with our food. And today, many of us are either parents or the ninongs and ninangs of our barkada’s children. And this time, mom can’t tell us what (or what not) to do with our food. Year in, year out Dalgona coffee . Ah yes! That early pandemic concoction off the cupboard most would rather forget. There was a before, there is an after. Before , we saw the ubiquity of samgyeopsal, from upscale grills in CBDs to Unli P199 neighborhood joints . Then there was ube in everything, from leche flan to champorado, a “trend” which was the norm in the Philippines for decades, got picked up in the West in the late 2010s, then re-emerged back home with new spins. And let’s not forget milk tea. Paired with avocado toast. After , milk tea stalls, a dime a dozen, transformed overnight into corner cafes. Many of them serve the cloyingly Filipino Spanish latte, normally made with espresso, milk, and condensed milk. The coffees are often paired with Korean corndogs and Korean egg drop sandwiches (trending side by side with Korean fashion). In 2024, from Brat Summer to Demure Amihan, we’re seeing yet another crop of food trends: homemade tanghulu, cucumber salads (like ube and tanghulu, it’s the West fangirling over an Asian staple), and even a food process: making everything from scratch, from cereal to...

title: महविश हयात से फवाद खान तक, वो पाकिस्तानी स्टार्स, जिन्होंने सुंदर दिखने के लिए करवाई सर्जरी
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
content: फिल्म इंडस्ट्री की दुनिया के सितारे अपने टैलेंट और अपनी खूबसूरती के लिए भी पहचाने जाते हैं. बॉलीवुड हो या हॉलीवुड या फिर पाकिस्तानी इंडस्ट्री से जुड़े स्टार्स, अक्सर सेलेब्स खूबसूरत दिखने के लिए अपने फेस की सर्जरी करवाते हैं. आपको ये तो पता ही होगा कि परफेक्ट लुक पाने के लिए कई बॉलीवुड सेलेब्स ने प्लास्टिक सर्जरी का सहारा लिया है. अब यहां हम आपको बताते हैं ऐसे ही कुछ पाकिस्तानी सेलेब्रिटिज के बारे में, जिन्होंने अपनी खूबसूरती को बढ़ाने के लिए कॉस्मेटिक सर्जरी का सहारा लिया था. पॉपुलर पाकिस्तानी एक्ट्रेस आयशा उकबा मलिक, जो आयशा खान के नाम से भी जानी जाती हैं, उन्हें ‘खुदा मेरा भी है’ और ‘मन मायल’ में उनकी एक्टिंग के लिए खूब सराहा गया. ऐसा कहा जाता है कि एक्ट्रेस ने खूबसूरत दिखने के लिए कुछ सर्जरी कराई थी. आयशा ने राइनोप्लास्टी करवाई, क्योंकि पिछले कुछ सालों में उनकी नाक का लुक पूरी तरह से बदला हुआ नजर आया है. इसके अलावा, एक्ट्रेस ने लिप फिलर्स भी करवाए हैं. पाकिस्तानी फिल्म और ड्रामा के सबसे हैंडसम एक्टर्स में से एक फवाद खान ने भी अपने लुक को शार्प और परफेक्ट बनाने के लिए प्लास्टिक सर्जरी करवाई थी. रिपोर्ट्स के मुताबिक, फवाद ने अपने करियर के शुरुआती दौर में नाक की सर्जरी करवाकर अपनी नाक को शार्प करवाया था. वहीं, ऐसा भी कहा जाता है कि फवाद ने जॉ लाइन भी परफेक्ट करवाई है. फवाद खान को अपने मशहूर पाकिस्तानी ड्रामा ‘जिंदगी गुलजार है’, ‘हमसफर’, ‘दास्तान’ से खूब पॉपुलैरिटी मिली थी. महविश इस समय पाकिस्तान की टॉप और सबसे महंगी एक्ट्रेसेस में से एक हैं. 2009 में एक फेमस ब्रिटिश मैगजीन ने उन्हें दुनिया की 8वीं सबसे सेक्सी एशियाई महिलाओं में शामिल किया था. महविश हयात ने लिप जॉब और नोज...

title: 上北地方の縄文出土品一堂に 三沢で再発見フェア(デーリー東北新聞社)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 上北地方の縄文遺跡から出土した約1260点の遺物が並ぶ会場 縄文時代の遺物などを紹介する「地元の縄文再発見フェアinかみきた」が14日、三沢市公会堂で始まった。上北地方で出土した土器や土偶、石器などを展示。弓矢や石を使ったくるみ割りなどの体験コーナーも設け、楽しみながら縄文文化に触れることができる。16日まで。 青森県埋蔵文化財調査センターの「『地元の縄文』再発見プロジェクト」の一環。同センターと三沢市教委が共催した。 県内の縄文遺跡3581カ所のうち、上北9市町村には約3割に当たる966カ所(2023年4月現在)が所在。草創期から晩期まで約1万年続いた縄文時代の全時代を網羅するように遺跡が残っている。 土器や装飾品など、当時の生活を想起させる1257点の遺物を展示。出土品を印刷した「あおもり縄文カード」も配布している。 くるみ割りと弓矢を体験した三沢市立古間木小1年の岡田怜士さん(7)は「面白かった。昔の人が弓矢を使って生活していたのはすごい」と笑顔を見せた。 入場無料。午前9時~午後5時(最終日は同4時)。15日は午後1時から講演やシンポジウムを開催する。申し込み不要。 デーリー東北新聞社 缶入りアルコールを手に「酒を飲みながら車を運転している男がいる」目撃したドライバ―が通報 呼気検査で基準値2倍超、50歳の男「納得がいかない」 「付き合っていると思われてもよかった」パリオリンピック銅メダリスト バドミントン東野有紗が語る新婚生活と "わたがしペア" の本当の関係 “ポッポのクレープ”全国最後の店舗 約40年作り続けた店長「こんなに愛されていたんだ...」 “青春の味”求め9月29日の閉店を前に連日行列で「涙が出てくる」 独自の進化遂げ考案の『焼きそばクレープ』 「やばい」「降りましょう」 北海道・道央自動車道バス炎上 全員避難直後 何度も爆発音 「まずいコメの産地」から躍進! 北海道米が全国に認められるようになったワケ コメ高騰続くなか今年の収穫は?

title: Colorado Looking Much Better At Halftime Against Colorado State
content: It's safe to say that Colorado State isn't exactly on the level of the Nebraska Cornhuskers - offensively or defensively - with the way that Deion Sanders' Colorado Buffaloes have handled them today. After suffering a blowout loss in Week 2 to Nebraska, Sanders and the Buffaloes were hoping for a bounceback performance against the Rams at Canvas Stadium in Fort Collins. Thus far, it's been exactly what they wanted it to be. Colorado has taken a 14-3 halftime lead over Colorado State thanks to a sharp performance from star quarterback Shedeur Sanders and versatile receiver/cornerback Travis Hunter. Sanders is 20 of 27 for 167 yards and two touchdown passes to LaJohntay Wester , while Travis Hunter once again leads the team in receptions and receiving yards through the half. Hunter is also putting in the work at defensive back as usual. Arguably the biggest star of the show has been Colorado's defense, which did not allow a first-half touchdown for the first time in Coach Prime's tenure. The Buffaloes have limited the Rams to just five first-downs and 116 yards of offense. Sam Hodde/UFL/Getty Images Colorado can't afford to get complacent though. They've blown more than enough leads to need to stay in control and avoid making any big mistakes. But if they can finish off the game with a win, they'll get to return to Folsom Field for their first in-conference game as a member of the Big 12 against Baylor next week with their heads held high. The game is being played on CBS....

title: Pearly-Thinaah makin hampiri gelaran
creator: MUHAMMAD HELMEE RAMLI
content: BEREGU wanita negara, Pearly Tan-M. Thinaah mengulangi pencapaian musim lalu apabila sekali lagi menjejakkan kaki ke perlawanan akhir pada Kejohanan Badminton Terbuka Hong Kong yang merupakan saingan Jelajah Dunia Super 500. Pada aksi separuh akhir yang berlangsung di Hong Kong Coliseum, Kowloon semalam, beregu No. 8 dunia itu menyingkirkan pilihan utama kejohanan dari Korea Selatan, Baek Ha Na-Lee So Hee menerusi kemenangan 22-20, 17-21, 21-15. Lebih manis, ia merupakan kemenangan kedua berturut-turut yang dilakar ke atas pasangan No.2 dunia itu selepas mereka turut melakukannya di separuh akhir Terbuka Korea dua minggu lalu. Walaupun gembira dengan kejayaan melangkah ke perlawanan akhir, namun Thinaah enggan terlalu meraikannya kerana percaya mereka memiliki tugas yang belum selesai apabila turun beraksi di pentas final hari ini. “Sudah tentu kami sangat gembira kerana dapat melangkah ke perlawanan akhir dua kali berturut-turut di Terbuka Hong Kong. Bagaimanapun, kami masih ada satu lagi perlawanan, jadi perlu kekalkan fokus. “Kami baru sahaja bertemu mereka (Ha Na-So Hee) sebelum ini, jadi tidak banyak ubah corak permainan. Mereka beri tekanan, terutamanya di set kedua tetapi kami gembira kerana masih mampu melayakkan diri,” katanya kepada BWF selepas tamat perlawanan. Selain memburu gelaran pertama musim ini, Pearly-Thinaah juga berpeluang untuk menamatkan kemarau kejuaraan hampir dua tahun selepas kali terakhir mereka memenangi kejohanan Jelajah Dunia adalah di Terbuka...

title: इजराइल में बंधकों की रिहाई के लिए नेतन्याहू का विरोध, सड़क पर उतरे हजारों प्रदर्शनकारी
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
content: इजराइल में एकबार फिर सीजफायर और बंधकों की रिहाई को लेकर प्रदर्शन तेज हो गए हैं. इस कड़ी में सरकार के खिलाफ हजारों प्रदर्शनकारी तेल अवीव में इकट्ठा हुए. उन्होंने गाजा में बंधक बनाए गए बंधकों की रिहाई के लिए बड़े प्रयासों की मांग की. दरअसल शनिवार को इजराइली प्रदर्शनकारी सेना मुख्यालय और अन्य सरकारी भवनों पर जुटे और जमकर प्रदर्शन किया. इस दौरान प्रधानमंत्री बेंजामिन नेतन्याहू के खिलाफ नारे लगाए गए. साथ ही युद्धग्रस्त क्षेत्र में अभी भी बंद 100 से अधिक कैदियों की रिहाई के लिए हमास के साथ शांति को लेकर दबाव डाला. दो हफ्ते पहले गाजा से छह बंधकों के शव बरामद होने के बाद इजराइल में एक बार फिर प्रदर्शन हुए हैं. अल जजीरा के अनुसार, पिछले वीकेंड के प्रदर्शन में अनुमानित 750,000 लोगों ने भाग लिया था. शनिवार को मार्च में शामिल हुए बंधकों के परिवारों ने उनकी रिहाई के लिए बातचीत करने के सरकार के प्रयासों पर निराशा जताई. वहीं कई लोगों ने समझौता करने में विफलता के लिए पीएम नेतन्याहू को जिम्मेदार ठहराया क्योंकि उन्हें लगा कि युद्ध के दौरान उन्हें सत्ता पर बने रहने में मदद मिलेगी. गाजा में संघर्ष पिछले साल 7 अक्टूबर को हमास के हमले के बाद बढ़ गया, जहां लगभग 2,500 आतंकवादियों ने गाजा पट्टी से सीमा पार करके इज़राइल में प्रवेश किया, जिससे लोग हताहत हुए और बंधक बना लिया गया था. इजराइल ने नागरिक हताहतों को कम करने के प्रयास करते हुए पूरे आतंकवादी ग्रुप को खत्म करने के लक्ष्य के साथ हमास के बुनियादी ढांचे को टारगेट करने के लिए गाजा में हमला किया. संयुक्त राष्ट्र ने कहा कि हाल की एक घटना में, गाजा में एक स्कूल-आश्रय स्थल पर इजराइली एयर स्ट्राइक में मारे गए लोगों में हमारी एजेंसी के छह कर्मचारी भी...

title: 消息称联想拯救者新一代 Y700 电竞平板 10 月发布,8.8 英寸大小
content: IT之家 9 月 15 日消息,联想于 9 月 13 日宣布拯救者 Y700 8 寸电竞平板“它来了”,具体发布日期暂未公布。不过,据博主 @体验 more 透露,这款新品的发布时间为 10 月,搭载骁龙 8 Gen3 处理器,依旧为 8.8 英寸大小。 今年 8 月,有一款型号为 TB321FU 的联想新机现身 GeekBench,该机单核得分 2209,多核得分 6509,配备 12GB 运存,预计为新一代 Y700 电竞平板。目前,关于这款新品平板的具体参数,联想拯救者官方暂未公布。 作为参考,IT之家附 2023 款拯救者 Y700 部分信息如下: 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: Pre-order iPhone 16 Sudah Dibuka, Ini Varian yang Paling Banyak Dipesan
content: Pre-order iPhone 16 Sudah Dibuka, Ini Varian yang Paling Banyak Dipesan Virgina Maulita Putri - detikInet Minggu, 15 Sep 2024 08:30 WIB Varian iPhone 16 yang paling banyak dipesan di pre-order Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET Jakarta - Apple sudah membuka pre-order iPhone 16 series sejak Jumat, 13 September kemarin. Lewat pre-order ini sudah diketahui varian iPhone 16 apa yang paling banyak dipesan. Setelah pre-order dibuka, iPhone 16 series seharusnya akan tersedia untuk konsumen pada hari peluncuran yaitu 20 September. Tapi ketersediaan beberapa model mengalami kemunduran karena stoknya yang menipis. Model yang saat ini ketersediaannya paling terbatas adalah iPhone 16 Pro dan iPhone 16 Pro Max. Menurut pantauan detikINET di website Apple Amerika Sertikat, tidak ada varian iPhone 16 Pro atau iPhone 16 Pro Max dalam konfigurasi atau warna apapun yang tersisa untuk pengiriman pada hari peluncuran. ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Baca juga: Awas Ada Tawaran Palsu iPhone 16, Bisa Kuras Uang Tanggal pengiriman iPhone 16 Pro Max bahkan ada yang mundur hingga 8-15 Oktober, satu bulan setelah ponsel ini pertama kali diperkenalkan. Sementara itu, tanggal pengiriman iPhone 16 Pro sebagian besar mundur hingga 3-8 Oktober. Untuk iPhone 16 dan iPhone 16 Plus sebagian besar akan tersedia tepat waktu pada 20 September. title: Guillermo Acosta: En EE.UU. buscamos mejores negocios, porque detrás de ello hay más empleo
creator: Federico Giammaría
content: El ministro de Economía de Córdoba, Guillermo Acosta, insiste en remarcar el valor que Vaca Muerta, y la minería, tienen para la provincia. Si tener ni petróleo, ni gas ni litio, se puede ser un jugador importante en esos mercados. Por eso, le propuso a AmCham que la gira que lo trajo a Estados Unidos junto al gobernador Martín Llaryora, y a 15 empresarios, pasara primero por Houston. “En EE.UU. buscamos mejores negocios, y detrás de ello hay más empleo”, sintetizó Acosta. –¿Por qué Houston? ¿Por qué hablar de petróleo y minería desde Córdoba? –Este no es el primer viaje que hacemos con AmCham, es el tercero que hace Llaryora, aunque el primero como gobernador. Las paradas anteriores habían sido las obligadas: Washington, por cuestiones más vinculadas a la política y al funcionamiento del sector público, y después Nueva York, por lo financiero. En este caso decidimos innovar, le hicimos la propuesta y AmCham lo tomó muy bien. ¿Por qué Houston? Porque es la capital mundial de la energía, y en Córdoba Llaryora impulsa lo que tiene que ver con la transición energética e ir hacia energías limpias. Pero sabiendo que es una transición; y como transición, también tiene energías convencionales. En eso, Córdoba tiene una ventaja: no posee el recurso natural, pero sí las capacidades industriales para proveer a los procesos vinculados a la extracción y distribución de, por ejemplo, petróleo y gas. Convencional, o no convencional como el shale . –La...

title: プロが教える“スニーカーのキレイ目コーデ、ボトムスの正解はどれ?” すぐまねしたくなるスタイルが大人かわいい(ねとらぼ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 スニーカーをおしゃれに履きたいときのボトムスは? キレイ目コーディネートにスニーカーをおしゃれに取り入れる方法を、パーソナルスタイリストの布施さえさんがInstagramで紹介しました。動画は記事執筆時点で7万2000回以上再生されています。 【画像】キレイ目コーデを見る 布施さんはこれまでにも「服はあるのに着るものに困る」「白Tシャツが体操服に見える」など、大人世代からの数々の悩みにを解決するちょっとしたコツを紹介してきました。2024年4月に公開した「ヒールが履けない方必見! 大人の垢抜けスニーカーコーデ」の動画は、記事執筆時点で再生数66万9000回を超えるなど今なお注目を集めています。 今回新たに公開した動画では「足が痛くてヒールが履けない! 素敵にスニーカーを履きたい! そんなお悩みをお持ちの方のために」とコメントを添えて、スニーカーと合わせやすいボトムスの選び方を紹介しました。 まず挙げたのは、ワイドパンツです。布施さんはオールホワイトのスニーカーに黒のワイドパンツスタイルのオールインワンを合わせたスタイルで登場。バッグはスニーカーと同じ白を選んだシンプルなモノトーンコーデですが、バッグに巻いた色鮮やかなスカーフがアクセントになっています。 幅広のワイドパンツは脚の形が出づらく、大人世代の強い味方。スニーカーと合わせても違和感のない上品な着こなしです。 続いて白のスニーカーに合わせたのは、紺色のロングスカート。タイトなシルエットと落ち感のある素材でかっちりした印象ですが、スニーカーと組み合わせることで程よくカジュアルダウンしています。トップスには白のブラウス、光沢感のある黒のハンドバッグを取り入れ、爽やかな印象を与えています。 また、フレアロングスカートにスニーカーを合わせても大人っぽくスタイルが良く見えるとのこと。白地にモノトーンのプリントが施されたTシャツ、白のフレアスカート、ベージュのノーカラージャケットにくすみカラーのスニーカーを合わせたコーディネートもすてきです。足元にボリュームがある分、髪をまとめて耳元に大きめのアクセサリーを着けると上半身がキュッとコンパクトに見えますね。 布施さんは動画に添えて「中途半端な丈のものを合わせるとスタイル悪く見えるので、ロングがオススメです」と、スタイルが良く見えるボトムス選びのコツを教えてくれました。 布施さんのInstagramでは、この他にも「パジャマに見えないボーダーコーデ」や、ポッコリおなかが気になる方向けの「ウエストインしないコーデ」など、大人世代の悩みに向けた動画が多数公開されています。 また、ファッションコンサルティングやショッピング同行、オンラインファッション相談の詳細はサービスメニューページから確認可能。最新情報は公式LINEでも発信しています。画像提供:布施さえ(sae_fuse)さん ねとらぼ 生まれた瞬間「小顔でイケメンになるね」と言われた息子...しかし1ヶ月後の姿に「思わず笑っちゃいました」「どっちもかわいすぎます」の声...

title: 16 या 17 सितंबर, कब है अनंत चतुर्दशी? जानें पूजन मुहूर्त और खास विधि
content: Feedback Anant Chaturdashi 2024: भाद्रपद माह में गणेश चतुर्थी से अनंत चतुर्दशी तक भगवान गणेश की पूजा भक्तों द्वारा की जाती है. अनंत चतुर्दशी के दिन श्रीहरि की उपासना की जाती है. साथ ही, इस दिन गणपति विसर्जन किया जाएगा. गणपति विसर्जन से पहले भगवान गणेश की पूजा की जाती है. इस बार अनंत चतुर्दशी 17 सितंबर को मनाया जाएगा. Anant Chaturdashi 2024: सनातन धर्म में अनंत चतुर्दशी का व्रत बहुत ही खास माना जाता है. अनंत चतुर्दशी को अनंत चौदस के नाम से भी जाना जाता है. इस दिन भगवान विष्णु की उपासना की जाती है. लेकिन, इसी दिन गणेश जी का विर्सजन भी होता है. हिंदू पंचांग के अनुसार, भाद्रपद माह के शुक्ल पक्ष की चतुर्दशी तिथि को अनंत चतुर्दशी का त्योहार मनाया जाता है. इस बार अनंत चतुर्दशी 17 सितंबर, मंगलवार को मनाई जाएगी. अनंत चतुर्दशी की पूजा के पश्चात इस दिन अनंत सूत्र बांधा जाता है. ये खास सूत्र कपास या रेशम का बना होता है और इस सूत्र से चौदह गांठें बांधी जाती हैं. इस दिन भगवान गणेश से जुड़ी कई झांकियां भी निकाली जाती हैं. अनंत चतुर्दशी की तिथि (Anant Chaturdashi 2024 tithi) इस बार अनंत चतुर्दशी की तिथि का आरंभ 16 सितंबर को दोपहर 3 बजकर 10 मिनट पर शुरू हो जाएगी और इस तिथि का समापन 17 सितंबर को सुबह 11 बजकर 44 मिनट पर होगा. उदयातिथि के अनुसार, अनंत चतुर्दशी इस बार 17 सितंबर, मंगलवार को ही मनाई जाएगी. अनंत चतुर्दशी 2024 पर गणपति विसर्जन का मुहूर्त अनंत चतुर्दशी के दिन गणेश जी का विसर्जन किया जाता है. इस दिन गणेश जी के विसर्जन के लिए सबसे शुभ मुहूर्त दोपहर 3 बजकर 20 मिनट से शाम 4 बजकर 50 मिनट तक रहेगा. ये बहुत ही शुभ मुहूर्त है. आपको कुल 1 घंटा 30 मिनट का समय मिलेगा. विसर्जन से पहले पूजन...

title: 廢物可能是寶物!二手交易風吹向台灣,日本最大網購市集 Mercari 插旗
creator: 財訊
content: 日本最大網購市集 Mercari(美露可利)8 月 29 日宣布,以跨境電商身分進軍台灣,推出繁體中文使用介面和指定貨幣付款。消息傳出,許多年輕人都非常興奮、躍躍欲試,因往後不必透過代購,就能買到限定日本銷售的商品。 Mercari成立於2013年,為二手物品銷售平台。2024年6月會計年度資料,營業額成長9%為1,874億日圓:淨利比前一年增加3%為134億日圓,創歷史新高,是2018年股票上市後首次連兩年出現淨利,總市值「超過4,000億日圓」。 《財訊》報導,業績迅速成長的原因是,過去只有擅長使用網路的人才能上網交易,但Mercari透過應用程式,任何人都能銷售任何物品,且買家只要用手機拍攝、決定售價,加上簡單說明上傳,如果售出也會收到通知。 因介面非常方便,許多人都翻箱倒櫃找出用不到的物品出售。不只家電服裝,動漫或偶像周邊商品、絕版相機器材等,想丟掉的東西可能是別人夢寐以求的寶物,平台就扮演媒合角色。曾在Mercari購買商品的動漫迷就說,有些周邊只在日本銷售,外國人只好透過這個網站買。 且日本人通常物品會妥善保存,故商品狀態良好。有些人發現原來不起眼的東西也能賣,拚命出貨,甚至成為重要收入來源。媒體還特地指導賣家拍照或說明的技巧,以提高成交率。 Mercari公關部門指出,服務另一個特色是,採安心安全又方便的使用者介面設計(UI)和使用者經驗設計(UX),且匿名配送服務,買賣雙方都不會知道對方個人情報,包括姓名、住址和電話號碼。日本國內目前每個月約2,300萬人使用,累計商品上架數超過30億,商品交易總額達1兆日圓。 進軍台灣的原因,Mercari說台灣二手交易近年顯著成長,有些日本二手品店也來台展店,很有成長潛力。用採訪聆聽台灣顧客聲音後,發現尤其年輕人,因環保意識和經濟理由,很多人喜歡用二手商品,和日本相似。 以今年1~6月為例,Mercari跨境電商交易,台灣交易件數和金額排名第二,很多顧客都是Mercari的愛用者。「娛樂和嗜好」領域商品更占四成多,和台灣民眾喜好一致。Mercari也計劃11月11日光棍節前展開大型促銷活動,以提高知名度。 ▲ Mercari透過應用程式,讓任何人銷售任何物品。 日本二手商品業者如HARD OFF、GEO控股公司旗下2nd STREET,早在台灣布局,且有實體店面,物品也多元化。日本二手商品原本國外就相當有人氣,因「日本製」向來是品質保證,且日本人通常保存良好;即使有點髒污也無損性能,海外消費者還是非常樂意收購。 另日本高齡少子化,長期看市場是縮小,必須早一步開闢海外戰場。HARD OFF 2017年開始進軍海外,2018年也在台灣桃園開了第一家店,目前有四家店;2nd STREET品牌2018年到美國設點,2020年進軍台灣,在九縣市有32家店。 《財訊》報導,Mercari也計劃打造全球性市場,早在創業第二年的2014年就進軍美國,每個月用戶為453萬人;繼台灣後,希望拓展至更多國家,且希望不只讓海外顧客購買日本商品,中長期看也希望外國賣家商品在Mercari平台交易。 二手商品大致分為不需要和高價收購物品,台灣不太有賣舊衣的習慣,對二手商品的印象就是名牌才能交易。不過日本二手店增加後,知道不僅環保、省荷包,且能和更有需要的人分享,普及後市場可望再擴大,預估台灣二手市場競爭將愈趨激烈。 (本文由 財訊 授權轉載;圖片來源: 株式会社メルカリ )

title: Hong Kong has what it takes to bounce back. We just need to pull together
creator: Regina Ip
content: In hindsight, the phenomenal numbers notched up in 2018 can hardly be healthy or sustainable, considering the small size of the city, the paucity of attractions and the lack of diversity of tourists. The sky-high spending of mainland Chinese tourists on luxury products skewed the local economy, bringing outsized profits to landlords and luxury retailers, but took away any potential incentives for locals to upgrade services or bring in innovative shopping and dining experiences.

title: अश्व‍िन चेन्नई टेस्ट में इन 3 भारतीय सूरमाओं को पछाड़ेंगे? होमग्राउंड में होगा ये कर‍िश्मा
content: Feedback भारतीय टीम बांग्लादेश के ख‍िलाफ पहला टेस्ट मैच चेन्नई में 19 स‍ितंबर से खेलने उतर रही है. इस मुकाबले में गेंदबाजी के ल‍िहाज से बात करें तो रव‍िचंद्रन अश्व‍िन के पास 3 भारतीय गेंदबाजों को पछाड़ने का मौका है, आइए जानते हैं कैसे? India vs Bangladesh 1st Test 2024 Chennai: अगले सप्ताह की 19 तारीख, जगह: चेन्नई का एमए चिदम्बरम स्टेडियम और आमने- सामने होंगे भारत-बांग्लादेश. ये दोनों देश WTC (वर्ल्ड टेस्ट चैम्प‍ियनश‍िप की 2023-25 साइक‍िल) के तहत टेस्ट मैच खेलेंगे. बांग्लादेश हाल में पाक‍िस्तान को 2-0 से टेस्ट सीरीज रौंदकर भारत आ रहा है, ऐसे में उसका कॉन्फ‍िडेंस सातवें आसमान पर होगा. बहरहाल, इस मुकाबले में गेंदबाजी के ल‍िहाज से रव‍िचंद्रन अश्व‍िन कई बड़े-बड़े सूरमाओं को पीछे छोड़ सकते हैं. चेन्नई में होने वाला यह टेस्ट मैच रव‍िचंद्रन अश्व‍िन के लिए बेहद स्पेशल होगा, क्योंकि यह उनके होमग्राउंड पर होगा. यह वही मैदान है, जहां अश्व‍िन ने क्रिकेट की बारीकियां सीखी हैं. चेन्नई में 'अश्व‍िन अन्ना' का गेंदबाजी का रिकॉर्ड बेहद शानदार और जानदार है. वह यहां कप‍िल देव, हरभजन सिंह और इरापल्ली प्रसन्ना के टेस्ट विकेटों के आंकड़ों को पीछे छोड़ सकते हैं. सम्बंधित ख़बरें चेन्नई में अश्व‍िन गेंदबाजी के साथ बल्लेबाजी में भी चमके हैं. अश्व‍िन ने फरवरी 2013 में चेन्नई के चेपॉक में सबसे पहला टेस्ट मैच खेला था. जहां उन्होंने 12 विकेट लिए थे. उसके बाद से अश्व‍िन कुल 4 टेस्ट मैच चेन्नई में खेल चुके हैं. जहां उन्होंने 30 विकेट झटके हैं. चेपॉक में सबसे ज्यादा विकेट दिग्गज स्प‍िनर अन‍िल कुंबले के नाम हैं. title: Patung kek undang spekulasi, peminat, rakan artis minta Fattah Amin dan Fazura selamatkan rumah tangga
creator: AL FAIZAL ABDUL KARIM
content: 15 September 2024, 9:29 am KUALA LUMPUR: Ramai peminat dan rakan artis mendoakan agar rumah tangga pasangan selebriti, Nur Fazura dan Fattah Amin utuh dan berkekalan. Harapan itu turut disuarakan pelakon dan pengacara popular, Serina Redzuawan, yang meminta Fattah, selaku ketua keluarga, menyelamatkan perkahwinannya. “Happy birthday adikku Fattah Amin. Tolong selamatkan rumah tangga anda dengan Fazura, adik. Minta petunjuk Allah. “Sedih tengok Fatima kecil dan memerlukan anda berdua. “Ujian rumah tangga pasti ada. Dilanda badai itu, adat. Anda sebagai kapten kapal, perbaiki semula. “Semoga perkahwinan suci dapat diselamatkan,” tulisnya di ruangan komen pada video ucapan hari jadi yang dimuat naik Fattah di Instagramnya (IG). Menerusi video itu, anak pasangan berkenaan, Fatima tampil menyampaikan ucapan hari lahir buat bapanya sambil dirakam Fazura. Desas desus konflik rumah tangga pasangan itu ternyata benar apabila Fazura dua hari lepas memfailkan permohonan cerai terhadap Fattah di Mahkamah Rendah Syariah Petaling. Fazura tidak hadir ke mahkamah, sebaliknya menyerahkan perkara itu kepada peguam yang dilantiknya. Sementara itu, peminat terus berspekulasi apabila Fattah, semalam menyambut hari kelahirannya yang ke-34, turut menunjukkan kek hari jadinya yang dihiasi patung seorang bapa dan anak perempuannya. “Kek itu sudah triggered, daddy duduk dengan Fatima, tanpa Mommy. “Semoga hubungan kamu berdua kembali terjalin,” tulis netizen. Hak cipta terpelihara © 2024, Utusan...

title: 赤瓜に豚だしのうまみが染みる炒め煮「モーウイイリチー」 のどごし良く、暑い日にぴったり(沖縄タイムス)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 モーウイイリチー 沖縄でおなじみの家庭料理や行事料理を、もっとおいしく作りたい! 琉球料理を長年教えてきた松本料理学院(那覇市)の講師の皆さんに、自宅でおいしく作るための基本のレシピと押さえておきたいコツあれこれ(ありんくりん)を教えてもらいます。沖縄食材や調理方法の解説もあわせてチェックしてみて! 随時動画を追加していきます。 モーウイ(赤瓜・赤毛瓜)は沖縄の夏野菜。アカウイとも言います。味は淡泊でクセがなく、水分豊富で低カロリー。炒め煮する際のポイントは、艶良く透明感が出るまで煮込むこと。モーウイに豚だしが染み込み、のどごし良くいただけます。(松本料理学院講師・名嘉裕子) 【材料(5人分) 調理目安時間30分】モーウイ...1.2kgサラダ油...大さじ2~3豚三枚肉(ゆで)...80gかつおだし・豚だし...合わせて1カップ~※かつおだしだけでもよい塩...小さじ1しょうゆ...少量 モーウイを洗って、縦に2つ割りにして皮と種を除き 1 モーウイを洗って、縦に2つ割りにして皮と種を除き=写真 厚さ5ミリ~1センチに切る 厚さ5ミリ~1センチに切る=写真 2 ゆでた豚三枚肉を短冊に切る。 鍋にサラダ油を熱し、豚三枚肉を入れて脂がジリジリと出てきたら、モーウイを入れて強火で炒める。全体に油がまわったら、だしを鍋肌から加える 3 鍋にサラダ油を熱し、豚三枚肉を入れて脂がジリジリと出てきたら、モーウイを入れて強火で炒める。全体に油がまわったら、だしを鍋肌から加える=写真。 4 途中で煮減りしたら数回に分けてだしを鍋肌から加える。 モーウイが軟らかくなったら塩としょうゆを加え、味が浸透するまで煮込む 5 モーウイが軟らかくなったら塩としょうゆを加え=写真=味が浸透するまで煮込む。 松本料理学院の外観 「松本料理学院」は、1969年に那覇市に開校した、沖縄伝統の琉球料理が学べる料理学院です。学院長は松本嘉代子先生。「食は命の薬(ヌチグスイ)」との考えが息づく伝統的な琉球料理のレシピと味覚の伝承に、長年力を注いでいます。料理教室は、松本先生らが講師を務める「琉球料理科」、家庭料理が学べる「食のいろは科」、来客向け料理をつくる「おもてなし科」の三つ。遠方の方も参加できるオンラインワークショップも準備中です。 隣接するカフェ「琉球styleまつもと」では朝ごはんとランチで、琉球料理や沖縄の旬の食材を使った日替わりメニューが味わえます。 松本料理学院沖縄県那覇市泉崎1-9-13 電話=098-861-0763琉球styleまつもと電話=098-917-2841ホームページhttps://matsumoto-ryorigakuin.okinawa/ 「台風のたまご」熱帯低気圧が2つ発生へ【雨・風のシミュレーション17日~20日】台風13号の次は? globe KEIKO(52)「ついに復活した最強の歌姫」わずか「2秒」の歌声が心掴む 有名ラッパーの下田ムトアリッキー容疑者が暴行容疑で逮捕 逮捕状を示される様子を自身のSNSでライブ配信 沖縄 追い越し中に正面衝突...

title: "전기차 더 싸게 만들어야 탄다"...'캐즘' 극복과제는 [성상훈의 배터리스토리]
creator: 성상훈
content: 소비자들이 '전기차를 사지 않겠다'는 이유는 다양합니다. 충전인프라, 충전속도, 주행거리, 안정성 등 수많은 이유가 있지만 핵심 요인 중 하나는 역시나 가격입니다. '특별한 차이도 없는데 내연차 대비 비슷하거나 오히려 비싼 가격으로 굳이 전기차를 사야하냐'는 건 전기차를 사지않는 대부분의 소비자들의 생각입니다. 전기차사들이 배터리사들도 이를 잘 알고 있습니다. 전기차 시장을 확대하려면 지금보다 가격을 낮출 필요가 있다는 점은 업계 관계자라면 누구나 공감하고 있습니다. 캐즘(대중화 전 일시적 수요침체)에 빠진 업계가 최근 배터리 가격 낮추기에 몰두하고 있는 것도 이러한 이유입니다. 특히 전기차 가격의 40%를 차지하는 핵심부품인 배터리에 대한 고민이 큽니다. 어떻게 하면 배터리를 좀 더 싸게 만들 수 있을 까는 현재 전기차, 배터리 업계의 최대 고민입니다. 배터리 가격을 낮추기 위해서는 소재를 싸게 생산하거나 공급받는 방법도 있지만, 현재 국내 회사들이 가지고 있는 벨류체인내에서는 한계가 있습니다. 갑자기 소재를 싸게 들여올 수는 없는 법입니다. 대신 배터리사들은 공장내에서 제품을 만드는 과정인 공정 혁신 쪽으로 눈을 돌리고 있습니다. 이런 고민끝에 나온 것이 '건식 공정'입니다. 배터리 제조과정은 크게 리튬·코발트·알루미늄·흑연 등 광물 생산 과정-양극재·음극재와 같은 소재 생산 과정-소재들을 모아 배터리 셀을 제조하는 과정으로 나뉩니다. 마지막 단계인 배터리 셀 제조단계에서 공정혁신 조짐이...

title: 軽量ソーラールーフ開発、一年で最大350kWhの電力供給、航続を2500km延長へ(レスポンス)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 軽量ソーラールーフを開発したWebasto ルーフシステムを手がけるWebastoは9月10日、持続可能なモビリティを目指す新しいルーフコンセプト「EcoPeak」を発表した。 この新しいルーフシステムは、持続可能性、革新、モダンなデザインを融合させたもの。Webastoは、製造と運用だけでなく、製品自体でもCO2eフットプリントを削減する可能性を見出している。 「EcoPeak」は、バイオマスバランスとリサイクル素材を主に使用し、ソーラーパネルを組み込むことで車両に環境に優しい電力を供給する。この新しいルーフシステムは、従来のアルミニウム製品に比べて最大40%の軽量化を実現しており、エネルギー効率と燃料効率の向上に寄与する。また、耐久性などの製品特性は従来通りの高品質を維持している。 「EcoPeak」パネルは、ルーフエリアとリアウィンドウの両方をカバーしており、この拡大された表面にはソーラーパネルが装備されている。これにより、年間最大350kWhの電力を供給し、車両の走行距離を約2500km延ばすことが可能という。また、リサイクルPETボトルから作られたローラーブラインドも統合されており、Webastoの循環経済への取り組みを強調している。 このコンセプトスタディによれば、環境に優しい基本コンポーネントとビジョナリーデザインのおかげで、従来のルーフシステムと比較して約50%のCO2e排出削減が可能だ。 Webastoは、持続可能性、機能性、美的デザインを完璧に組み合わせたソリューションを開発するために、顧客と共に取り組んでいく。 レスポンス 森脇稔 トヨタ新型「SUVミニバン」登場に反響多数!?「熱望」「全スライドドアは便利」ありそうで無かった“ちょうどいい”サイズ感の「クロスバン ギア」とは 久しぶりに実家に帰ると父親が「待てど暮らせど年金が払われない」と。聞いてみたら年金の請求をしていなかった!これまでの年金はどうなる? 道路にある「謎のカメラ」は“スピード違反取締り”だけじゃない! 「罰金30万円級」の違反車両を見つける「重大な役割」に反響集まる! なぜ人口増? 美しいビーチ「サザンでは聴くけど」...茅ヶ崎に人が集まる理由 東京まで乗り換えなし1時間弱! 中古マンション4000万円台から 航空祭で戦闘機が白煙に包まれたのですが危なくないんですか? 操縦士は前見えているのでしょうか 「サストモ」by LINEヤフー だれかの声を、社会の力に変える。 世帯年収900万円・40代夫婦、戸建て購入から10年後“地獄のマイホーム生活”へ...誠実そうな営業マンの「家賃並みの返済額で買えますよ」を信じた末路 「高校でずっと1位」なのに、現役でまさかの「東大不合格」...彼が抱き続けた東大への未練 日本で最高評価の「断熱窓」は海外では「違法レベルの低性能」という驚愕の事実 一条天皇が死ぬ間際に「定子と彰子」どちらの中宮に想いを残したのか。和歌に残された「君」のなぞ...

content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 UHB 北海道文化放送 大人気の直売所でどんな人が何を買って、どう食べているのか、1日張り込み調査をする「道民リアルめし調査隊」。 マオイの丘 ファーマーズマーケット 今回訪れたのは、北海道長沼町の道の駅「マオイの丘 ファーマーズマーケット」。 長沼町は採れない野菜がないと言われるほど農業が盛んで、お店に並ぶ野菜はほとんどが長沼産。 とれたての新鮮さと安さが魅力のこの直売所で、北海道民の"リアルめし"を調査しました。 キャベツの芯のような味わいが特徴の「コールラビ」 午前9時。開店と同時に訪れた来店客が購入したのは「コールラビ」という野菜。 アブラナ科の野菜で、キャベツの芯のようにシャキシャキとした味わいが特徴で、みずみずしく甘みがあり栄養も豊富です。 生でも加熱してもOK 浅漬けやサラダ、炒め物など生でも加熱してもおいしく食べられるといいます。 1番人気は旬のとうもろこし 1番人気は、旬のとうきび。 買い物かごがとうもろこしでいっぱいになるほど購入している人も、ちらほら。この直売所では、この日4種類以上のとうきびを販売していました。 3歳の子どもを育てるママさんは、子どもが大好きなとうもろこしご飯のレシピを教えてくれました。 とうきびご飯の作り方 【いまが旬!とうもろこしご飯の作り方】〔材料〕・とうもろこし 1本・お米 2合・酒 大さじ1・塩 小さじ2 とうもろこしの粒だけではなく、芯も一緒に入れて炊くことで甘みが強くなるようです。 大玉トマトを1箱購入 ピューレを作るため、大玉トマトを1箱購入していた女性。 トマトピューレを使い、生地から手作りのピザを作るといいます。 生地から手作りピザ 【生地から手作りピザ】[材料]・トマトピューレ・タマネギ・ピーマン・オホーツクのホタテ・チーズ・バジル230°Cのオーブンで15分焼くと完成。 3世代でお買い物中の安達さんご家族 父、母、姉妹と姉の子どもの3世代でお買い物中に取材を受けてくれたのは、姉妹の妹さん。 札幌市中央区のご実家で暮らす安達恵里紗さん(29)。二世帯住宅で、祖母と両親、弟との5人暮らしです。 1 / 3ページ 缶入りアルコールを手に「酒を飲みながら車を運転している男がいる」目撃したドライバ―が通報 呼気検査で基準値2倍超、50歳の男「納得がいかない」 「付き合っていると思われてもよかった」パリオリンピック銅メダリスト バドミントン東野有紗が語る新婚生活と "わたがしペア" の本当の関係 “ポッポのクレープ”全国最後の店舗 約40年作り続けた店長「こんなに愛されていたんだ...」 “青春の味”求め9月29日の閉店を前に連日行列で「涙が出てくる」 独自の進化遂げ考案の『焼きそばクレープ』 「やばい」「降りましょう」 北海道・道央自動車道バス炎上 全員避難直後 何度も爆発音 「まずいコメの産地」から躍進! 北海道米が全国に認められるようになったワケ コメ高騰続くなか今年の収穫は?

Hal ini berarti pelanggan setia hemat Rp1.249.800 dari harga normal. title: Gina London: We can all learn lessons in good communications from the US presidential debate
content: THE COMMUNICATOR Drinkers in a bar in New York watch the US debate. Picture: Getty I purposefully wrote all this before the US presidential debate, because I don’t want to get bogged down in post-debate analysis. Instead, I want to use their debate to provide you key strategies to shape perception, build trust, and sway opinions in a business setting. Bookies were taking bets on what colour tie Trump was going wear and what colour suit Harris would select. Your attire sends a message about credibility, confidence, and approachability. Context: Your wardrobe should align with the event’s formality and the industry norms. A tech panel may allow for more casual attire, while a financial conference might call for something more conservative. Authority and approachability: Choose something that reflects your role and personality but also invites engagement. For men, a well-tailored suit in neutral tones conveys professionalism, while a bright tie or pocket square can add a touch of personality. For women, a fitted blazer with a pop of colour can project both competence and warmth. Stay comfortable: If you are uncomfortable in your clothing, it will show. Make sure you feel good in what you wear. Non-verbal cues – tone of voice, facial expressions, body language – play a big role in establishing trust with your audience. Tone: A strong, steady voice conveys confidence and credibility. However, varying tone to emphasise key points or show emotion makes you seem more engaging. Avoid...

Declan Lynch: Kamala Harris played Donald Trump like a cheap, fake Stradivarius
content: Donald Trump was riled by Kamala Harris as she struck what could be a key blow in their debate The strongest response to the Trump-Harris debate was probably that of the journalist John Sweeney in one of his great War Diary videos which he has been tweeting since Russia invaded Ukraine. He was “offering a prayer of thanks for Kamala defeating Donald Trump last night. We need Ukraine to win.” Prayers of thanks are not the usual journalistic reaction to anything, but Sweeney is one of those unusual commentators who not only understands the enormity of what is at stake in this US election, he is prepared to state it clearly — without the spurious ­“balance” and the “bothsidesing”. title: ‘It could be any man in the village’ – France hunts rapists of grandmother Gisele Pelicot
content: Trial of French man for drugging his wife and recruiting men to rape her may be suspended due to his health problems Gisele Pelicot, who was allegedly drugged and raped by men solicited by her husband Dominique Pelicot. Photo: Reuters It is a modest house with blue shutters in Mazan, a pretty Provencal village surrounded by the vineyards beneath Mont Ventoux. Set behind a white iron gate and a tall cypress, this is the unassuming former home of Dominique Pelicot, the French pensioner on trial for drugging his wife and recruiting more than 80 men online to rape her as she lay unconscious in her bedroom while he filmed them. title: The north London derby: A proper blood feud or just a bit of banter?
content: Two tribes who thoroughly despise each other, or at least feel as if they probably should, will go to war today Arsenal's Martin Odegaard. Photo: Adam Davy/PA Stoke Newington on the verge of derby weekend is not a place for the faint of heart. Located right in the centre of the bitter turf war between the ­historic rivals Arsenal and Tottenham, even on a sunny Friday lunchtime its leafy parks and terrace-lined streets drip with menace. Take a wrong turn, or catch the wrong eye, and nobody can really say what will happen next. A King Charles spaniel yowls ferally on the approach to Clissold Park. The blood on the pavement outside the bakery turns out, on closer inspection, to be jam from a doughnut.

title: Editorial: Kamala Harris has a grave responsibility to get this election right
content: Kamala Harris needs a sound economic plan to convince voters. Photo: AP Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas, Nevada. Photo: Reuters Pope Francis made a surprise intervention in the US presidential election on Friday by urging voters to “choose the lesser evil”. His Holiness did not specify which of the candidates was most deserving of that tag, but the rest of the world need not be so circumspect. There are now 51 days to go until the election and just how imperative it is that the victor on November 5 must be Democrat candidate Kamala Harris has never been more evident than during the first debate this week against her ­Republican rival. Donald Trump offered one of the most disturbing performances by a candidate in American political history, even declaring at one point that immigrants were eating people’s cats and dogs. The racist remarks made the notoriously thin-skinned Trump a figure of ridicule worldwide. In truth, though, it is no laughing matter. Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas, Nevada. Photo: Reuters With the election so near, and the polls still so close, these glimpses into Trump’s fact-free, conspiracy-addled imagination are a cause for serious concern among America’s allies should he make it back, emboldened, to the White House. That remains a very real prospect. Harris may have won the debate by a country mile, but winning a debate against a man so chaotic in his thinking is not a high bar to clear and her supporters would be foolish to let...

title: British soldier in court after man ‘knocked out’ in Kilkenny following ‘Bonds of Friendship’ golf tournament
content: Stock image A British soldier attending a golf tournament in Kilkenny involving members of An Garda Síochána, Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI), the British Army and the Irish Defence forces has been arrested and charged with assault. Attached to the British Army’s Irish Guards based in Northern Ireland, he was visiting Kilkenny to take part in an annual event when it is alleged he knocked a man unconscious, in the early hours of Tuesday. The soldier has since appeared in court charged with assault. Sources say the assault was “at the higher end of the scale”, but the alleged victim later regained consciousness. Garda Commissioner Drew Harris had been due to join as a guest of honour to meet those taking part in the tournament, which is named “The Bonds of Friendship”. However, after the alleged assault he did not attend the event as planned because of a “diary clash that arose”, according to a source. Bonds of Friendship' annual event took place in Kilkenny Members of An Garda Síochána, the PSNI, the Irish Defence Forces and Northern-Ireland based Irish Guards officers and soldiers stayed at various hotels in Kilkenny and played golf over a number of days. “The Bonds of Friendship” event was this year organised by the Irish Defence Forces. Garda Headquarters confirmed a man had been injured and another person later charged with assault in Kilkenny last week. A statement said: “Shortly after 2am on Tuesday, 10th September 2024, while on patrol, gardaí discovered...

title: CLB TPHCM – TC Viettel: Cân sức (19g15, ngày 15-9)
content: Đội chủ nhà vốn có nhiều biến động về lực lượng trong thời gian qua khi chia tay một số trụ cột. Đáng chú ý là Sầm Ngọc Đức, Ngô Tùng Quốc hay các ngoại binh Timite, Lucas vốn để lại ấn tượng ở mùa bóng trước. Thay vào đó, HLV Phùng Thanh Phương cũng kịp đưa về nhiều gương mặt mới để kịp chuẩn bị cho mùa bóng 2024-2025. Dù vậy, nếu so sánh vào danh sách đi/ở giữa hai mùa thì nhà cầm quân này không kém phần lo lắng. Giải giao hữu diễn ra trên sân Thống Nhất mới đây hay trận tập huấn cùng B.Bình Dương (hòa 2-2) là cơ hội quý cho Ban huấn luyện đội bóng này rà soát lực lượng, nhất là cân chỉnh hệ thống phòng ngự được dự báo mỏng hơn so với trước. Tuyến trên đang có nhiều dấu hỏi về chất lượng thì trong khung thành lại dư thừa khi có 2 thủ môn tài năng là Patrick Lê Giang và Bùi Tiến Dũng. Ở bên kia sân, TC Viettel hầu như chỉ tập tại “đại bản doanh” và đến cận ngày khai mạc, thầy trò HLV Nguyễn Đức Thắng mới cáp các trận giao hữu. Hai trận gần nhất đã thua 0-2 trước SLNA và 1-4 trước Hà Nội FC. Những kết quả trên không lên được nhiều vấn đề bởi đó là những trận mang tính lắp ghép đội hình hoặc thời điểm đội vừa trải qua giai đoạn tập nặng. title: Skulduggery Pleasant novelist and podcaster Derek Landy: ‘Imagination is born from boredom’
content: My Cultural Life 'Skulduggery Pleasant' author Derek Landy. Photo: Brid O'Donovan The Skulduggery Pleasant fantasy novel series has spawned a new podcast release Derek Landy is the writer of Skulduggery Pleasant novels. His latest, The Haunted House on Hollow Hill, is published in hardback by HarperCollins on September 26, following its recent launch as a titular podcast serialised in six weekly narrative episodes. BOOK Indian Lake Trilogy Stephen Graham Jones’s Indian Lake Trilogy has provided every bit of nourishment – both nuanced and outrageously bloody – that any horror fan could ask for. Throw in the new Joe R Lansdale and the new Adrian Tchaikovsky, and you more than satisfy those crime and science fiction appetites, too. Wash it all down with Tynion and Dell’edera’s Something is Killing the Children and you have one of those feasts that you want to share with everyone and yet guard jealously at the same time. STREAMING Star Trek Surfing a wave of nostalgia, I got it into my head to rewatch all of the Star Trek movies and I’ve been having a wonderful time. My girlfriend, not so much. I’ve also been going through Miami Vice , loving the guest stars, the music and the sheer coolness of Crockett’s clothes. My girlfriend, not so much. But what we have been adoring are Slow Horses and The Boys , proving that nothing brings a couple together more than clever writing and extreme violence. The Skulduggery Pleasant fantasy novel series has spawned a new podcast release MUSIC...

title: DLA Piper hopes to add 135 ‘high-value’ jobs
content: Legal services Public Expenditure Minister Pascal Donohoe will speak at the transatlantic summit. Photo: Collins David Carthy International law firm DLA Piper hopes to create 135 high-value jobs in Ireland over the coming years as it reveals revenue in the country has hit over €30m. David Carthy, country managing partner for Ireland, said the world’s fourth largest law firm by turnover, with global revenues of $3.69bn (€3.34bn) last year, has always seen “plenty of opportunity” in the Irish market since it launched here in May 2019. DLA Piper currently employs 115 people, with ambitions to grow the business to 250 people over the next few years. Carthy said DLA Piper would continue to grow sustainably alongside its clients’ needs, including multinationals, emerging ­technology companies and governments looking to navigate legal landscapes across continents. Carthy said traditional sectors DLA Piper has offered services for in Ireland include technology, financial services and life sciences. Increasingly, he said, the firm had seen areas growing in this market such as energy, renewables and insurance. DLA Piper is holding its transatlantic summit on Wednesday as it marks five years in Ireland. The summit will be attended by more than 300 business leaders from Ireland and the US, and a packed agenda will examine issues influencing organisations on a global scale, both sides of the Atlantic. The event will include a keynote from ­Paschal Donohoe, Public Expenditure Minister....

title: 전문대 수시모집 아직 진행 중...더 좋은 대학 갈 수 있는 법은
creator: 김정현 기자
content: [세종=뉴시스]김정현 기자 = 2025학년도 수시모집은 아직 끝나지 않았다. 일반대는 지난 13일 문을 닫았지만 전문대는 오는 11월 중순까지 수험생을 기다린다. 원서는 6장보다 더 많이, 원하는 만큼 쓸 수도 있다. 잘만 찾으면 직업교육에 노력하고 내 꿈과 끼를 살려주는 좋은 전문대를 만날 수 있다. 하지만 잘 알려진 일반대 입시와는 다른 점이 많아서 알아 둬야만 한다. 15일 한국전문대학교육협의회(전문대교협)와 진학사 등에 따르면, 전문대 130곳은 지난 9일부터 다음달 2일까지 2025학년도 1차 수시모집을 진행하고 있다. 이번 모집에서는 총 12만2897명을 선발한다. 전문대 수시모집은 한 번 더 이뤄지는데, 129개 학교가 오는 11월8~22일 2만7500명을 모집한다. 2차 모집보다 지금 진행 중인 1차에서 4배 더 많은 신입생을 뽑는다. 2차 수시는 다른 특징이 있다. 오는 11월14일 대학수학능력시험(수능)이 지나서도 원서를 받는다. 수험생으로선 수능 가채점 결과와 정시에서 지원할 수 있는 대학을 함께 올려 놓고 고민해 볼 여유가 있다. 일반대 수시는 학교 내신 성적이나 활동, 아니면 면접이나 논술 실력이 중요하다. 정시는 수능이 끝나면 내가 어느 대학에 갈지 계산할 수 있다. 평가하는 과목도 폭넓기 때문에 하루 아침에 바꾸기가 쉽지 않다. 낙담할 필요는 없다. 전문대는 학교와 전형을 잘 조합하면 지금 성적으로도 합격 가능성을 보다 높일 수도 있다. 수시에서는 학교생활기록부를 선발에 써도 성적이...

title: Staff at UHL say they are demoralised by media coverage about the hospital
content: University Hospital Limerick. Photo: Don Moloney Nearly three in 10 staff at University Hospital Limerick (UHL) said they did not believe a friend or relative would get a good standard of care or service if they needed treatment there. The hospital has been beset by overcrowding and embroiled in controversy this year, including damning failures that were revealed at an inquest into the tragic death of Aoife Johnston in December 2022. A survey carried out at UHL also detailed how staff were demoralised by media coverage and social media discussion of their workplace. In one question, workers were asked if they would be happy with the standard of care a loved one would get if they needed treatment at or admission to the hospital. Nine per cent said they strongly disagreed, 19pc disagreed and 20pc said they were undecided. In another question, UHL staff were asked if they would recommend the hospital as an employer for a friend or family member. Ten per cent said they strongly disagreed, 13pc disagreed, and 19pc said they were not sure. Concerns were also raised about conditions with 35pc saying they were dissatisfied with their workplace environment Asked whether overall service provision at UHL was improving, 36pc said it was deteriorating and 32pc said it had remained the same in recent times. The survey was conducted last year as part of biannual research carried out by the hospital into how staff feel. Concerns were also raised about conditions with 35pc saying they were...

title: Quantum chips can solve Ireland’s data-centre problem, says Equal1 CEO Jason Lynch
content: ‘We need to look at this as an investment in the jobs of the future’ says tech boss Jason Lynch, CEO of Dublin-headquartered Equal1 Quantum solutions could reduce the amount of energy that AI consumes. Graphic: Getty Quantum computing can help solve Ireland’s data centre problem and also allow us to lead the next wave of technological innovation, but not if the country closes the door to data centres. That’s according to Jason Lynch, the CEO of Dublin-headquartered Equal1, whose firm is a global leader in designing silicon-powered quantum computing technology. “We need to look at this as an investment in the jobs of the future,” he says. ‘If we close the door now I think we will do serious harm’ “We should look to become the leaders in sustainable data centres, and in three to five years I believe quantum computing will bring huge advantages in this regard and ensure that data centres are much more sustainable. “But if we close the door now I think we will do serious harm – and the country could miss out on a massive opportunity to attract the next generation of technology,” he adds. Equal1 is bidding to become the Intel of the quantum computing world, he says. Quantum solutions could reduce the amount of energy that AI consumes. Graphic: Getty The firm, which was founded six years ago and which has previously raised €35m, is currently preparing for a significant new fundraising round – likely to be in the tens of millions. This new round of fundraising will probably be...

title: ‘No clear direction’: report into Aoife Johnston’s death at UHL uncovers confusion among staff about overcrowding protocol
content: Family disappointed as report into A&E tragedy makes no adverse findings and does not apportion blame Aoife Johnston was 16 when she died from sepsis in December 2022 The chief executive of University Hospital Limerick issued an instruction aimed at easing emergency department overcrowding two months before Aoife Johnston died — but it was never clearly communicated to staff, according to an unpublished investigation report. Colette Cowan told former chief justice Frank Clarke’s inquiry into Aoife’s death that in October 2022 she had directed staff to move admitted patients out of the emergency department and on to wards. title: Four-day krishi mela in Dharwad from September 21
content: The University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS), Dharwad, will host the annual krishi mela for four days from September 21 on the university premises with the theme ‘agricultural technologies for management of climate change’. For the first time, the university will use QR code for registration of the participants. Addressing presspersons in Dharwad on Saturday, vice-chancellor of UAS Dharwad P.L. Patil said the main objective of the mela was to provide information on farm technologies and around 14 to 16 lakh farmers were expected to participate this year. Cropping systems for climate change management, integrated crop management, bio-fertilizers and bio-pesticides, oilseeds, pulses and rabi crops technologies would be the prime attractions during the fair this time. Focus had also been laid on agro-forestry and fodder crops technologies, animal husbandry and livestock exhibition, value addition and secondary agriculture and community science technologies, he said. Prof. Patil said that like before, a seed mela to distribute quality seeds for rabi season would be held with a formal inauguration scheduled on September 21. As many as 469 quintals of rabi sorghum, 300 quintals of wheat, 1,212 quintals of bengal gram, 68 quintals of safflower, 12 quintals of black gram, 28 quintals of cow pea, 76 quintals of groundnut, 11 quintals of navane, with a total of 2,176 quintals of seeds would be available for sale during the mela, he said. Prof. Patil said that Chief Minister...

title: PM मोदी का गुजरात-ओडिशा में 3 दिन का दौरा:अहमदाबाद में 8000 करोड़ रुपए के मल्टीपल प्रोजेक्ट का उद्घाटन करेंगे
content: प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी 15 से 17 सितंबर को गुजरात और ओडिशा का दौरा करेंगे। इस दौरान वे अहमदाबाद में 8,000 करोड़ रुपए के कई डेवलपमेंट प्रोजेक्ट्स का उद्घाटन करेंगे। वहीं, मंगलवार को भुवनेश्वर में ‘प्रधानमंत्री आवास योजना’ का फायदा ले रहे लोगों से मु रविवार की शाम गुजरात पहुंचेंगे प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी 15 से 17 सितंबर तक की सुबह गुजरात में रहेंगे। पीएम रविवार की शाम करीब 4 बजे अहमदाबाद पहुंचेंगे। अहमदाबाद एयरपोर्ट से ही वडसर के लिए रवाना हो जाएंगे। यहां वे एयर फोर्स के नए ऑपरेशन कॉम्प्लेक्स का उद्घाटन करेंगे। शाम 6 बजे गांधीनगर राजभवन में रात्रि विश्राम करेंगे। गिफ्ट सिटी मेट्रो स्टेशन तक मेट्रो की सवारी करेंगे पीएम प्रधानमंत्री 16 सितंबर को सुबह करीब 09:45 बजे गांधीनगर में पीएम सूर्य घर मुफ्त बिजली योजना के लाभार्थियों से बातचीत करेंगे। इसके बाद सुबह करीब 10:30 बजे गांधीनगर स्थित महात्मा मंदिर में चौथे वैश्विक नवीकरणीय ऊर्जा निवेशक सम्मेलन और एक्सपो (री-इनवेस्ट) का उद्घाटन करेंगे। दोपहर लगभग 1:45 बजे अहमदाबाद मेट्रो रेल परियोजना का उद्घाटन करेंगे और खंड-1 मेट्रो स्टेशन से गिफ्ट सिटी मेट्रो स्टेशन तक मेट्रो की सवारी करेंगे। इसके बाद अहमदाबाद-गांधीनगर मेट्रो ट्रेन सर्विस के सेकंड फेज का उद्घाटन करेंगे। करीब 21 किलोमीटर लंबा यह रूट गांधीनगर ट्विन सिटी से जुड़ेगा, जिसमें आठ नए स्टेशन शामिल हैं। यह प्रोजेक्ट गुजरात मेट्रो रेल कॉर्पोरेशन (GMRC) ने तैयार किया है। 33 किमी में अब केवल 65 मिनट लगेंगे, किराया 35 रुपए अहमदाबाद के एपीएमसी से गांधीनगर के सेक्टर-1 तक की दूरी 33 किमी है। मेट्रो से अब एक जगह से दूसरी जगह जाने के लिए केवल 65 मिनट लगेंगे और 35 रुपए किराया होगा। वहीं,...

title: Toyota Camry ใหม่-เจอกันตุลาคมนี้ คาดหวังอะไร? จาก “ยืนหนึ่ง” ของกลุ่มที่ตลาดกําลังหดตัว
content: กลุ่มซีดาน 4 ประตูขนาดตัวโตพอที่จะใช้เป็นรถประเภทให้ผู้จัดการฝ่ายนั่งหลังแล้วมีโชเฟอร์ขับได้แบบนี้ เรียกตามภาษาคนเล่นรถก็คือ D-Segment ซึ่งรถแบบนี้ ก็เริ่มเติบโตในไทยตั้งแต่ช่วงรัฐบาล ดร.อานันท์ ทลายกําแพงภาษีรถนําเข้าในยุค 90s Toyota Corona ค่อยๆถูกลดบทบาทลง แทนที่ด้วย Camry ที่ตัวโตกว่า ส่วน Honda ก็ไปคว้า Accord บอดี้อเมริกาตัวมหึมา นํามาขายในไทย และ Nissan ก็ใช้ Cefiro A32 ซึ่งก็คือ Maxima ในอเมริกาที่มีไซส์ค่อนข้างใหญ่ ในทศวรรษนี้พวกรถพิกัด 2.0-2.3 ลิตรที่ตัวโตกว่า Corolla กับ Civic เริ่มเปลี่ยนจากรถสไตล์ครอบครัว กลายเป็นรถผู้บริหารมากขึ้น เครื่องยนต์ตั้งแต่ 2.0-3.5 ลิตร และหรูขึ้นจนบางคนที่เบื่อซ่อมรถยุโรป หันมาคบรถเหล่านี้แทน จากช่วงรุ่งเรือง ถึงบัดนี้เป็นช่วงซบเซาของ D-Segment แต่ก็มี Toyota Camry ที่อยู่รอดแบบผลงานค่อนข้างเสถียร ... เดือนตุลาคมที่จะถึงนี้ เราก็จะได้เห็น Toyota Camry ใหม่เวอร์ชั่นไทยแล้ว นับว่าโชคยังเข้าข้างนะครับ ที่ Toyota ประเทศไทยยังตัดสินใจยังทําตลาดรถรุ่นนี้ต่อ ทั้งที่ตลาด D-Segment นั้น ไม่ใช่ตลาดที่สามารถสร้างกําไรเป็นกอบเป็นกําได้อย่างที่ทุกคนคิด คุณเอ๋ย ปี 2023 ที่ผ่านมา รถกลุ่มไซส์ Camry/Accord/Seal พวกนี้ ขายไปได้รวมกันแค่ประมาณ 9,000 คันเท่านั้น อ่านดีๆว่า นี่คือยอดขายทั้งปีของทุกยี่ห้อรวมกัน ในขณะที่รถกระบะอย่าง Hilux Revo ในช่วงพีคๆเดือนเดียวก็ขายได้มากกว่านั้นแล้ว ยอดขายนั้น มีผลอย่างมากต่อชะตาของรถ ในสายตาของบอสที่นั่งอยู่เมืองนอก ตลาดไหนขายดี อยากขอนั่นขอนี่ก็ได้ตามขอ ตลาดไหน ขายเดือนละไม่กี่ร้อยคัน ก็ต้องดูล่ะ ว่าประเทศบ้านใกล้เรือนเคียงได้สเป็คไหน ก็จะโดนจัดสเป็คให้ใกล้เคียงกัน ทําไม D-Segment ถึงอยู่ในภาวะซบเซา...

title: Eamonn Sweeney: It’s not hard to see Heimir Hallgrimsson being chewed up and spat out sooner rather than later
content: ‘Welcome to Hotel Abbotstown, Heimir. They’ll stab you with their steely knives too, if you’re not careful.’ Photo: Piaras Ó Mídheach/Sportsfile Having most of us passed through the classic stages of our grieving process, we come to acceptance, the final stage, and are supposed to reach some sort of peace there. The time for rancour and recrimination is over. Followers of the national football team have come through a lot together, albeit that some are still lingering at depression, the penultimate stage, while a scattering of hardy hold-outs can be classified as still in the bargaining phase or even, further back, the anger and denial stations of the cross. Not everyone is moving at the same time through the process.

title: Heimir Hallgrimsson: Like it or lump it I will rely heavily on John O’Shea and Paddy McCarthy
content: Under fire Irish boss will continue to lean on his assistants for day-to-day duties Republic of Ireland head coach Heimir Hallgrimsson. Photo: David Fitzgerald/Sportsfile Heimir Hallgrimsson says he will continue to “share the load” with his coaching staff despite criticism of his approach to his first two games in charge. The new Ireland boss has been open about the prominent role both John O’Shea and Paddy McCarthy played in selecting the squad and preparing the team for the Nations League double-header.

title: Review: Mazda’s MX-30 R-EV is for those who prefer style over space – but it’s pricey for what’s on offer
İnna lillahi ve inna ileyhi raciun; Rabia Hocahanım - 11
creator: Reşat Nuri Erol
content: Önceki yazılarla birlikte okunmasını tavsiye ederek kaldığımız yerden devam edelim... Kur’an ehli ve hizmetkârı anne babamızın ardından Kur’an ehli ve hizmetkârı (Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı Kız Kur’an Kursu Hocası) Rabia Hocahanım da rahmet-i Rahman’a kavuştu... Rabia Erol Hocahanım kardeşimin vefatı vesilesiyle bu yazılar yazılıyor... Fecr Suresi sonundaki dört ayet üzerinde durmaya başlamıştık; devam ediyoruz ve böylece hem dünya hem de ahiret hayatımız ile ilgili gerçekleri anlamaya çalışıyoruz... *** Peki, müminler içine duhul nasıl olacaktır? Nefs radiyeten merdiyye olarak Rabbine döndükten sonra O’nun kulları arasına nasıl dâhil olacaktır? a) Önce beyan edecek, ‘ben müslimim’ diyecektir. Bu beyan açık olacak, herkes duyacak ve tekrar edecektir. Böylece bu kişi müslim olmuş olur. b) İkincisi, diğer insanlarla çıkan ihtilafları hakemler yoluyla çözecektir. Hakem kararlarına uyacağını baştan kabul etmiş edecek, sonra da verilen karara uyacaktır. c) Başka bir yükümlülük de cizye vermektir yani askere katılmadığına göre her yıl bir bedel ödeyecektir. d) Son olarak yaptığı sözleşmelere uyacaktır. Sözünde duracaktır. *** İşte bunları yapan radiyeten merdiyye olarak Rabbine rücu etmiş olur. Bundan sonra eğer ibadı arasına da girmek isterse, o zaman diğer ibadetleri de yapacaktır. 1) Namazlara katılacak ve günde beş defa diğer kullarla buluşacaktır. 2) Zekâtını vererek topluğa ait harcamalara katılacaktır. 3)...

title: Luke O'Neill: Noise and air pollution putting us in peril as fertility rates plummet
content: Fertility rates are falling across the world. Photo: Getty Over the past 50 years or so something important has been happening to men. The number of sperm they are producing is dropping, with studies showing a decrease in sperm count of around 50pc. The decrease has been speeding up over the past 20 years. This is occurring all over the world, suggesting something global is happening. There has also been a drop in the fertility of women. One in seven couples has trouble conceiving — which is defined as the lack of conception after one year of regular, unprotected sex. It’s stressful and is putting our species at risk of extinction. The question scientists are trying to answer is why? Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel Stay up to date with all the latest news

title: Five years after the murder of Sophie Toscan du Plantier, gardaí faced an agonising decision over letting Ian Bailey flee
content: Sophie Toscan du Plantier, left, with her best friend Agnes Thomas Detectives investigating the murder of Sophie Toscan du Plantier held an emergency conference in 2001 where they discussed allowing chief suspect Ian Bailey to flee to the United Kingdom so they could tip off the British authorities about his presence, according to a new book. Investigators learned of Bailey’s plan to flee from Ireland five years after Sophie’s murder and just four days after he assaulted his then-partner Jules Thomas. title: Leinster look best equipped to claim endangered title
content: Ulster head coach Richie Murphy. Photo: Seb Daly/Sportsfile The sands on which the rugby calendar is built continue to shift. Just as the URC season looms into view, presenting from the outside a stable competition that’s finally commanding attention in its own right, there is talk of further change. From a commercial point of view, merging with the English Premiership makes sense for the competing nations, but on the pitch there’s no doubt the competition is beginning to stand on its two feet.

title: Irish hotelier Tom Moran left over €21m in his will
content: Even in the heady days Tom Moran never lived a flash lifestyle. Photo: Damien Eagers Tom Moran, one of Ireland’s best known hoteliers, left over €21m in his will. He appointed his children, John and ­Karen, to oversee trust funds set out in the document. In the will, dated August 12, 2019, he left an estate valued at €21,213,101. Mr Moran died in March last year at the age of 72. During his career, which spanned more than 50 years, he built and lost an empire but he never lost his positivity. title: Hơn 15 triệu người sững sờ với hành động của cụ ông Yên Bái khi nhận được đồ cứu trợ
content: Những ngày qua, nhiều người rưng rưng nước mắt khi nhìn cảnh bà con ở vùng lũ các tỉnh thành phía Bắc. Khoảnh khắc người dân đi nhận đồ cứu trợ, hay lực lượng cứu trợ giúp đỡ bà con... đã trở thành hình ảnh đáng xem nhất lúc này. Mới đây, một clip nhận được hơn 15,6 triệu lượt xem chỉ trong chưa đầy một ngày đăng tải khi ghi lại cảnh người dân vùng lũ ở Yên Bái đi nhận đồ cứu trợ vào ngày 11/9. Trong dòng nước lũ chảy xiết, trời còn mưa tầm tã, người dân lội từ nhà ra và nước còn ngập đến cổ của họ. Lực lượng cứu hộ đã gửi những chiếc phao và túi đồ ăn đến cho người dân. Nhưng đặc biệt nhất là cụ ông ở ngay đầu clip. Trong cơn mưa và nước ngập đến chân, khi thấy đoàn thiện nguyện đến, cụ ông đã cúi đầu và chắp hai tay để nhận. Đến khi nhận đồ xong rồi, cụ ông cũng không vào nhà luôn, mà đứng bên ngoài dõi theo đoàn từ thiện. Dân tình cũng soi ra được cụ ông còn rưng rưng nước mắt khi nhìn thấy túi đồ ăn. Khoảnh khắc cụ ông chắp 2 tay như lạy đoàn cứu trợ, thay cho lời cảm ơn sâu sắc, đã khiến nhiều người không cầm nổi nước mắt. Một cái chắp tay đã nói lên tất cả sự khó khăn và biết ơn của bà con vùng lũ. Ai cũng thương cho cả cụ ông, lẫn...

title: Firavunî kuruntu, gerçek ilim ve yıkılacak sömürü düzeni
creator: Mustafa Kasadar
content: Sihirbazlar, Firavun’un talebi üzerine, Hz. Musa ile karşılaşacakları gün için aylarca hazırlandılar ve kazanacaklarından hiçbir şüphe duymadan sihir gösterilerine önce kendileri başladılar. Hazırladıkları ipleri, sopaları yere attılar. Atarken de Firavun’a yakın olmak ve yalakalık yaptıklarını göstermek için seslerini yükselterek: “Firavun’un üstün gücü adına, elbette üstün gelen biz olacağız.” (Şuara, 44) diyorlardı. Meydan sopa ve iplerle dolmuştu. “İnsanların gözlerini büyülediler, içlerine korku saldılar ve böylece büyük bir büyü gösterisi yaptılar.” (Araf, 116) Gözlerini kamaştırdılar ve onlar gerçekten yılan olmadığı halde gözlere öyle göründü. Hâlbuki gerçek değildi. Sopalar ve ipler gerçekte yerlerinde sakin duruyorlardı. O dönemin insanları sihre özel bir gözlükle bakıyorlar, sihirbazların hakikatleri değiştirebileceklerine ve istedikleri her şeyi yapabileceklerine inanıyorlardı. Meydandaki sihirbazların yaptıkları sihir öylesine büyük ve korkutucu idi ki bundan halkın tamamı etkilenip korkuya kapıldıkları gibi Hz. Musa da etkilendi ve içine korku düştü. İşte o anda ilahi irade devreye girdi ve şöyle hitap etti: “Korkma! Üstün gelecek olan kesinlikle sensin.” (Taha, 68) Sende olan iman ile küfür karşısında üstünsün. Bu hitap üzerine Hz. Musa üzerinden korkusunu hemen attı. Zira onun yaşadığı korku bir anlık insani korku idi. Ama hemen imanı galip geldi, bu duygulardan sıyrılıp çıktı....

title: No room at the inn for prying press at Fine Gael think-in as Simon Harris hailed for stable party

title: ‘He kept a diary for 70 years, every single day. When I finished them, I went down to my mother and apologised' – David McGowan on the death of his father
content: The funeral director lost his father during the pandemic Sligo funeral director David McGowan. Photo: Mark Condren David McGowan had his first experience with death when he was about 15. Help was needed in the funeral home in Easkey, Co Sligo, which his family ran alongside a pub and a grocery. A dead person needed to be lifted into a coffin. David was asked to assist. “I thought about the whole experience and realised that I had touched a dead person for the first time in my life and I wasn’t fazed by it,” he writes in his book, A Life Among the Dead: Stories from an Irish Funeral Director . title: Bir Kırılma Noktası Olarak 11 Eylül
creator: Mustafa Kaya
content: Tarihler 11 Eylül 2001'i gösterdiğinde, ABD'nin New York kentinde Dünya Ticaret Merkezi'nin İkiz Kuleleri’ne uçaklar ölüm dalışları yapıyordu. O esnada Amerika Birleşik Devletleri (ABD) Savunma Bakanlığı'nın (Pentagon) binasında da patlamalar meydana gelmişti. 3 binden fazla sivil insanın hayatını kaybettiğinin açıklandığı bu saldırılar dünyada şok etkisi uyandırmıştı. Daha sonra ABD basını dönemin Başkanı George W. Bush'un yeni saldırı endişesiyle “Air Force One” uçağında F-16'ların koruması altında 24 saat havada tutulduğunu yazacaktı. Söz konusu gelişme dünyada yeni bir kırılma etkisi olacağı çok geçmeden ortaya çıktı. Soğuk Savaş'tan galip çıkan ABD dünyayı yeni ve adı tam olarak konulamayan bir gerginlik ve savaş sürecine sokacaktı. "Küresel Terörizmle Savaş" ismi verilen bu yeni ve muammalı savaşın ilk sinyalini aslında 1990 yılında İngiltere'nin Başbakanı Margaret Thatcher vermişti. İngiltere Başbakanı, "Komünizmi yendik yeni tehlike radikal İslamcılar" demişti. İşte bu açıklamanın arazide karşılık bulduğu savaş 11 Eylül ile beraber başlamış oldu. Üstelik bu savaş diğerlerine hiç benzemiyordu. W. Bush'un ilk günlerde "Haçlı Seferleri" olarak tanımladığı bu savaşta düşman olarak görülen herhangi net bir tanım yoktu. "Düşman" diye nitelendirilen yüzü kapalı kimliği belirsiz kişilerin ekranlara yansıyan konuşmalarıyla içi doldurulan bir senaryo gibi duruyordu. Bu savaşta mekân tanımı da net...

title: My favourite room: ‘I wanted Georgian architecture with a contemporary twist’ — Inside influencer Caoímhe McGinley’s chic yet child-friendly Tyrone home
content: Influencer, DIYer and mother-of-four Caoímhe McGinley spent years abroad before settling back in Ireland and creating a dream home based on her travels and her love of period features Caoímhe in the living area — part of the open-plan kitchen/dining/living room with its extra-high ceilings. The large windows afford views of the countryside. The sofas are from DFS. Photo: Tony Gavin It’s become fashionable to give rooms, particularly children’s bedrooms, a theme when decorating them. A theme is often chosen just because it’s sweet, like a princess theme for a girl’s bedroom or Star Wars for a boy — fluidity in gender roles notwithstanding, it seems many little girls love a princess and boys enjoy battles. Influencer Caoímhe McGinley picked a travel theme for her little boy’s bedroom, and that doesn’t just mean a large map of the world on one of the walls. There is a map, but it’s wallpaper — and Caoímhe, the consummate DIYer that she is, put it up herself, just as she did all the other wallpapering and painting in this large house. In addition to the map, there are trunks, a compass and a chest of drawers in which the drawers look like suitcases. title: Taj Mahal feared to have been damaged by severe rainfall as water leaks into central tomb
content: Flooding near the Taj Mahal mausoleum last year. Photo: Getty Water has been leaking into the central tomb of the Taj Mahal after three days of sustained heavy rainfall led to a crack appearing in the roof of India’s most famous landmark. The government agency responsible for maintaining India’s monuments said it was urgently investigating the extent of the damage to the 17th-century mausoleum. title: 自由開講》「台獨」帽子隨便扣?中共懲獨法規太模糊啦!
content: ◎林宇馨 陸委會11日透過書面聲明表示,對於北京而言,不贊成統一就等同於「台獨」,寬泛的定義讓中共的「懲獨」法規變得極具威脅性,任何不認同中共立場的台灣人都可能成為被中共打擊的對象。 陸委會呼籲中共應立即停止透過法律模糊性和檢舉系統進行的威脅行動,並放棄利用恫嚇手段企圖改變台灣民眾的態度。(資料照) 「懲獨」法規模糊 擴大打擊範圍 中共聲稱的「懲獨」法規定義不清,國台辦雖宣稱法規只針對「極少數」台獨分子,但是否是台獨份子,中共說了算,任何與中共意見不一致的人,都可能因此被定罪,讓台灣民眾有極大的心理壓力。此種專斷獨行的做法,如何使台灣人民信服? 請繼續往下閱讀... 設立舉報網站:社會監控和不安的工具 中共設立舉報網站,不僅針對台獨分子,而是利用平台鼓勵民眾互相檢舉,透由此手段,中共希望造成台灣社會的恐慌和不安,使民眾彼此監視、懷疑,進而削弱社會的凝聚力,造成台灣社會動盪不安,以利中共趁虛而入。 恫嚇行為破壞兩岸關係 中共的恫嚇行為,嚴重影響兩岸關係的和平發展。透過模糊的法規和鼓勵檢舉的做法,損害台灣民眾的自由和權利,也破壞兩岸之間的信任基礎,無助於未來的對話與合作。 結論 陸委會呼籲中共應立即停止透過法律模糊性和檢舉系統進行的威脅行動,並放棄利用恫嚇手段企圖改變台灣民眾的態度。唯有在平等、互信的基礎上,兩岸才能真正展開建設性的對話,為未來的和平發展鋪路。 (作者為學生) 自由開講》是一個提供民眾對話的電子論壇,不論是對政治、經濟或社會、文化等新聞議題,有意見想表達、有話不吐不快,都歡迎你熱烈投稿。請勿一稿多投,文長700字內為優,來稿請附真實姓名(必寫。有筆名請另註)、職業、聯絡電話、E─mail帳號。本報有錄取及刪修權,不付稿酬;錄用與否將不另行通知。投稿信箱:LTNTALK@gmail.com 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: ‘I lost a Boots card that I had for 18 years. How do I reclaim my points?’
content: YOUR QUESTIONS A NSWERED When you take out a loyalty card, you sign up to specific terms and conditions. Photo: Getty Q I had a Boots Advantage card that I got around 2006 and had built up a good number of points on it that I was hoping to use soon. However, I moved house and lost the card. When I went into my local Boots, I asked if they would have details about my points on their system or online. The lady at the till said they don’t keep that information and gave me a form to fill in to apply for a new Boots card. title: Kerala Blasters vs Punjab FC LIVE streaming info, ISL 2024-25: When, where to watch KBFC vs PFC; Preview; Head-to-head
content: PREVIEW Kerala Blasters will open its Indian Super League (ISL) 2024-25 season with a home match against Punjab FC at the Nehru Stadium in Kochi on Sunday. Despite letting go of Dimitrios Diamantakos, the ISL’s top scorer last season, the Blasters scored plenty of goals in the pre-season in Thailand. In the Durand Cup, its Moroccan forward Noah Sadaoui took the Golden Boot award, and Kerala’s new head coach Mikael Stahre will be hoping Sadaoui and Spaniard Jesus Nunez continue their fine form in the season-opener against Punjab. Read full preview HERE Played: 3 Kerala Blasters wins: 2 Draws: 0 Punjab FC win: 1 When and where is the Kerala Blasters vs Punjab FC ISL 2024-25 match kicking-off? The Kerala Blasters vs Punjab FC ISL 2024-25 match will kick-off at 7:30 PM IST on Sunday, September 15 at the Nehru Stadium in Kochi. Where can you watch the Kerala Blasters vs Punjab FC ISL 2024-25 match? The Kerala Blasters vs Punjab FC ISL 2024-25 match will be live telecast on the Sports18 network . The match will also be live streamed on the Jio Cinema app and website . Comments Related Topics Kerala Blasters / Punjab FC / Indian Super League / ISL 2024-25 Latest on Sportstar

title: Narin, Leyla, Müslüme, Sıla ve suskunlar...
creator: Mine Alpay Gün
content: Türkiye çocuklarına ağlıyor, Aslında ülke ağlanacak vaziyette. Memleket ahalisi bozuk adaletini dert edip ağlamıyor, Kara para aklamaktan içeri girmiş, irinli varlıklarıyla zengin fenomenlerin 40 yılla yargılanıp 10 ayda hapisten çıkışlarına ağlamıyor. Zenginliğin hangi yoldan kazanılırsa kazanılsın bu ülkede her kesim tarafından el üstünde tutulmasına Adalet te dâhil oluyor. Bu kirli insanları özenle koruyor, yoksullara cezalar yağdırırken zengin hırsızları hapisten azade tutuyor. Çıktıklarında arsız fenomenleri yüzlerce kişi karşıladı. O görgüsüzler de Ferrarilerini sordular önce, sonra utanmadan paylaştılar görüntülerini. Ağızlarındaki haram peynire meftun olmuş avanakları daha fazla mest etmek için. Genç kızlar onları kaldıkları yerden hayranlıkla izlemeye başladılar. Türk Adaleti, ülke kızlarına sadece 10 ay sonra idollerini aklayarak iade etti. Bir düşünce suçlusu dışarı çıksaydı, sevenleri onu karşılamaktan korkacaklardı. Ülkenin her tarafında insan manzaraları trajedi. Son yıllarda binlerce çocuk kayboldu, çok fazla çocuk katledildi. Çürüyen toplum, her geçen gün vicdanlı insanları daha fazla karamsarlığa sürüklemekte. Daha yeni komşuya emanet edilen iki yaşındaki Sıla bebeğin istismar neticesi entübe edildiğini duyurdu haberler. Bu olayda da anne komşusunu korumak adına susmuş. Olay anlaşılmasın diye hastaneye geç götürmüş, Mersin’ de Yörük çocuğu Müslüme Yağal’ın katledilmesinde de dedesi...

title: Görünüyor
creator: Mehmet Biten
content: “Sabret, senin sabrın ancak Allah’ın yardımıyladır. Sakın onlara üzülme ve kurdukları tuzaklardan da endişe etme. Allah şüphesiz muttakiler ve muhsinlerle beraberdir.” (Nahl; 127-128) “Bir ömür. /Sözde özgür... Coşkudan uzak ve yavan Gök yerine bir basık tavan, Bunun farkına varılınca Arkada tek geçit, bin menzil Önümüzde yolun sonu görünür; Bu da kuraldır.” (Hüsrev Hatemi) Cumartesi Ağır Zaman “Kaybedeceğini bile bile neden mücadele ediyorsun dedi, Öleceğini bile bile yaşadığını unutmuştu o an. Bozmadım!” (Özdemir Asaf) Bu hafta boyunca sürekli zihnimde dönüp duran şey öğrenilmiş cehaletin her türlü cehaletten daha yakıcı ve yıkıcı olduğu gerçeğiydi. Rahmetli Cüceloğlu’ndan ögrendiğim ve birçok şeyi çok güzel açıklayan bu kavram şunu ifade ediyor: “Doğru bilinen yanlışların nesillere aktarılmasıyla oluşur. Tehlikelidir, çünkü gerçek doğruların/hakikatin öğrenilmesini engeller.” Öğrenilmiş cehalet, her yerden bizleri kuşatıyor. Öyle ki her türlü hareketimizi evirip çeviriyor ve hakikate ulaşmada bizleri mecalsiz bırakıyor. Bizi dar bir köşeye hapsederek bütün gardımızı düşürmemizi ve savunmasız bir şekilde gelen her turlu darbeyi kabullenmemizi sağlıyor. Yüz yüze kaldığımız her problemin çözümsüzlüğü bu cehaletin bir parçamız olarak bizi takip ediyor oluşundan kaynaklanıyor. Tanımlamalarımızı, değerlendirmemizi her şeyimizi etkisi altına alan bu cehalet ile hep aynı fasit dairenin...

title: Hasan el-Benna’dan Kudüs Yürekli Gençlere
creator: Dr. Abdülaziz Kıranşal
content: Kudüs davasını sürekli gündemde tutun: Şehit Hasan el-benna Hemen hemen her konuşmasında muhakkak Kudüs davasını gündeme getirdi ve şöyle dedi: “Kardeşlerim! Siyonistler sadece bir dilden anlıyor. O da devrim, güç ve kandır. Üzerinde La ilahe illallah'ın söylendiği bütün topraklar vatanımızın bir parçasıdır. Onun hürmeti ve kutsiyeti uğrunda cihaddan başka çare yoktur. Filistinin, İslam toprakları olması, Peygamberlerin beşiği olması ve Allah'ın mübarek kıldığı Mescid-i Aksa'nın içinde olması nedeniyle her Müslüman'ın vatanı ve davasıdır. Filistin halkı bizim kardeşimizdir. Kim Filistin'e yardım etmezse, Allah ve Rasulüne yardım etmemiş olur. Kim de ona yardım eder ve desteklerse kuşkusuz Allah'a ve Rasulüne yardım etmiş olur.” Tüm ihtilaflarınıza son verin: Hasan el-Benna’nın en büyük etkisi birleştiricilik etkisiydi. Her nereye gitse dağılmış Müslümanları, cemaatleri, dernekleri, tarikatleri, ilim adamlarını bir araya getirip aynı hedef doğrultusunda yönlendirebiliyordu. Çünkü o, özgür Kudüs için ilk önce Müslümanların kendi taassuplarından ve bağlarından özgürleşmesi gerektiğini düşünüyordu. Filistin’deki zulümlerin yoğunlaştığı bir dönemde Mısır’ın Mansura kentine gitmişti. Gittiğinde Ramazan’a az bir zaman kalmıştı. Bu sıralarda Şafiiler ve Hanefiler arasında çok büyük bir mezhebi taassup baş göstermişti. Şafiiler ve Hanefiler arasında teravih namazının rekât sayısı ile ilgili bir...
