title: Hà Nội miễn giảm thuế cho người bị thiệt hại do bão số 3
content: Cục Thuế TP Hà Nội vừa có thư gửi các doanh nghiệp, người nộp thuế về các chính sách gia hạn, miễn, giảm thuế trong trường hợp gặp thiên tai nhằm góp phần tháo gỡ khó khăn cho đối tượng chịu thiệt hại do bão số 3 (YAGI). Theo đó, người nộp thuế gặp khó khăn do thiên tai, hỏa hoạn, tai nạn, bệnh hiểm nghèo, ảnh hưởng đến khả năng nộp thuế sẽ được xét giảm thuế thu nhập cá nhân tương ứng với mức độ thiệt hại nhưng không vượt quá số thuế phải nộp. Người sản xuất hàng hóa thuộc diện chịu thuế tiêu thụ đặc biệt gặp khó khăn do thiên tai, tai nạn bất ngờ cũng sẽ được giảm thuế. Mức giảm thuế được xác định trên cơ sở tổn thất thực tế nhưng không quá 30% số thuế phải nộp của năm xảy ra thiệt hại. Ngập lụt sau bão gây ảnh hưởng đến nhiều hộ gia đình, tổ chức. Ảnh minh họa. Thuế giá trị gia tăng đầu vào của hàng hóa, dịch vụ dùng cho sản xuất, kinh doanh hàng hóa, dịch vụ chịu thuế giá trị gia tăng được khấu trừ toàn bộ, kể cả thuế giá trị gia tăng không được bồi thường của hàng hóa chịu thuế giá trị gia tăng bị tổn thất. Về thuế thu nhập doanh nghiệp, trường hợp doanh nghiệp có chi phí liên quan đến phần giá trị tổn thất do thiên tai, dịch bệnh, hỏa hoạn...

title: Seán Duke: ‘My parents worked hard to pay the school fees. They died without knowing this act of love had put me in harm’s way’
content: Seán Duke was seven when he started in Willow Park school. Photo: Mark Condren I arrived in Willow Park in 1972, aged seven. I was sent there because my parents wanted to send me to a school where teachers could be trusted. We lived in Lucan. I had been in first class in a convent school where a male teacher, who reeked of cigarettes, liked to walk behind us and randomly pinch and grab our ears while insisting we face forward. I was terrified and protested to my mother that I wanted out of his class. Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel Stay up to date with all the latest news

title: Women Health : घरातील कामं करताना 'हे' व्यायाम नक्की करा, वजन होईल कमी, काही दिवसातच दिसेल फरक
creator: एबीपी माझा वेब टीम
content: Women Health : ते म्हणतात ना... जन्म बाईचा..खूप घाईचा..त्याचप्रमाणे वाढत्या वयानुसार महिलांच्या शारिरीक आणि मानसिक आरोग्यात अनेक बदल होत जातात. कामाचा ताण, विविध जबाबदाऱ्यांचं ओझं, मुलांचे संगोपन या गोष्टींमुळे महिला इतक्या गुंतून जातात की त्या त्यांच्या आरोग्याची काळजी घ्यायला विसरतात. पण महिलांनो.. निरोगी राहण्यासाठी शारीरिक हालचाली करणे खूप महत्वाचे आहे, पण महिला सहसा घरातील कामात इतक्या व्यस्त होतात की, त्यांना व्यायामासाठी वेळ मिळत नाही. जर तुम्ही देखील अशाच व्यस्त लोकांपैकी एक असाल तर आज आम्ही तुम्हाला अशाच काही व्यायामांबद्दल सांगत आहोत जे तुम्ही घरातील काम करतानाही सहज करू शकता. सोशल मीडियावरील व्हायरल पोस्टनुसार आरोग्य तज्ज्ञ रमिता कौर यांनी याबाबत माहिती दिली आहे. घरगुती काम करताना हे व्यायाम नक्की करा स्वयंपाकघरात स्वयंपाक करताना तुम्ही पोटऱ्या ताणण्याचा व्यायाम करू शकता. यासाठी टाच उचला आणि पाचही बोटांवर भार टाकून उभे राहा. 30 सेकंद या स्थितीत राहा, नंतर पुन्हा सरळ व्हा. हे किमान 5 ते 6 वेळा पुन्हा करा. यामुळे पायांचे स्नायू सक्रिय राहतात आणि दुखण्यापासून आराम मिळतो. जेव्हाही पाणी प्याल, तेव्हा मालासनात बसून प्यावे. यामुळे पोटाचे स्नायू आकुंचन पावतात आणि अंतर्गत अवयवांना चालना मिळते. बद्धकोष्ठता दूर करण्यासाठी आणि पचन पुनर्संचयित करण्यासाठी हे उपयुक्त ठरू शकते. कामादरम्यान कोणाशी फोनवर बोलत असाल तर वज्रासनात बसून बोला. यामुळे पचनसंस्थेला आधार मिळतो आणि भजन चांगले पचते. जर तुम्ही घरात कोणत्याही गंभीर विषयावर चर्चा करत असाल तर नक्कीच हाकिनी मुद्रेत बसा. यामुळे मनाला शांती मिळते, एकाग्रता वाढते आणि संभाषणादरम्यान लक्ष केंद्रित राहते. जर तुम्हाला कपाटातून काही मिळत...

title: Milli Görüş’ün acı kaybı: Durmuş Öztaş ebediyete uğurlandı

title: Real Madrid : Grandes retrouvailles, Mbappé avait tout prévu
content: Kylian Mbappé va déjà revenir en France ! En effet, le tirage au sort de la Ligue des champions a offert deux affiches au Real Madrid dans l’Hexagone. Les Madrilènes se déplaceront à Brest et surtout à Lille où l’ancien attaquant du PSG affrontera Ethan Mbappé, son petit frère. Et à en croire Olivier Létang, Kylian Mbappé avait tout vu. Alors que la Ligue des champions nouvelle formule va enfin débuter, le tirage au sort a réservé un choc entre le Real Madrid et le LOSC . L'occasion pour Kylian Mbappé de revenir en France, et surtout d'affronter son petit frère qui a signé à Lille cet été. D'ailleurs, Olivier Létang révélait que l'attaquant du Real Madrid avait tout vu avant tout le monde. Le PSG a trouvé le successeur de Mbappé ! https://t.co/yRiPmoZM7t pic.twitter.com/XveyLA9jtb « On en avait parlé avec Kylian avant le troisième tour préliminaire contre Fenerbahçe. Il nous avait dit de déjà nous qualifier... On est assez proches. Pour les deux frères, c'est extraordinaire de se recroiser aussi vite et en Ligue des champions. On en rêvait tous. C'est encore une histoire dans l'histoire. Je vais aussi retrouver Carlo Ancelotti que j'avais croisé au PSG (quand il était directeur sportif) et même Thiago Motta avec la Juventus Turin. Tout ça est formidable », assurait ainsi le président du LOSC dans des propos rapportés par L'EQUIPE , avant de poursuivre. « On vendra chèrement notre peau contre tous les adversaires. Il faut qu'on soit...

title: AGD Adana’dan çağrıda bulundu: Vanaları kapat, yaraları kapat
content: Anadolu Gençlik Derneği (AGD) öncülüğünde binlerce vatandaş Adana’da bir araya geldi. “Vanaları Kapat, Yaraları Kapat” başlığı ile gerçekleştirilen eylemde, Bakû-Tiflis-Ceyhan Boru Hattı üzerinden Siyonist katil İsrail’e aktarılan petrolün durması için çağrıda bulunuldu. Eylem kapsamında Adana’nın Ceyhan ilçesinde bir araya gelen kalabalık, iktidara seslendi. TEMSİLİ KEFENLER DENİZE BIRAKILDI Eylem öncesinde Siyonist İsrail’in Filistin’de gerçekleştirdiği katliamlarda şehit olan çocukları temsilen denize kefen bırakıldı. Eylem Muhammed Enes Kıranşal’ın okuduğu Kur’an-ı Kerim tilavetinin ardından başladı. ÇALIŞKAN: “YETKİLİLERE SESLENİYORUZ, BU YAKITI DURDURUN” Filistin’de bir yıla yakın bir süredir katliamın sürdüğünü ifade eden Saadet Partisi Hatay Milletvekili Necmettin Çalışkan, İslam ülkelerinin tüm gücüne rağmen harekete geçmediğini belirterek, “Bugün bu alanda çok vicdan yarası bir husus için toplandık. Bir yıla yakın bir süredir Filistin’de katliamlar sürüyor. 57 tane İslam ülkesinin ise İHA’ları, SİHA’ları var ama tarihin en zayıf zamanlarından birini yaşıyoruz. Bu soykırımlar İslam dünyasının destekleri ile yaşanıyor. Katil Siyonist işbirlikçi İsrail’e hava sahalarını kapatsalar, deniz sahalarını kapatsalar o katiller nefes bile alamazlar. Bu alandan üzülerek ifade etmeliyiz ki iki devlet tek millet dediğimiz Azerbaycan petrolleri bu limanlardan İsrail’e gönderiliyor. Gidiyor da ne oluyor o...

title: «Уйти не могу — меня запинают толпой»: подростки безнаказанно нападают на посетителей «Сан Сити» — охрана с ними не справляется
creator: Эмиль Фукс
content: Родители пострадавших детей обратились в полицию Источник: Людмила Мизина / 2ГИС В начале сентября в МФК «Сан Сити» группа подростков избила сверстников. Родители пострадавших уверены, что это дело рук «банды», которая орудует в торговом центре. На работу комплекса и раньше поступали жалобы, которые чаще всего касаются проблем с безопасностью и работой охранников. НГС пообщался с недовольными посетителями «Сан Сити» и узнал, кто их охраняет. «По три человека на одного налетали» Жительница Новосибирска Юлия заявила о нападении на её сына в МФК «Сан Сити» на Карла Маркса, 7. По словам сибирячки, 2 сентября школьника избила группа подростков. Конфликт начался с просьбы закурить на фуд-корте. — После школы мой сын и ещё шесть подростков пошли в «Сан Сити», сидели на фуд-корте на четвёртом этаже. После того, как они поели пиццу, они сидели и разговаривали. За соседним столиком сидела компания подростков. Они подошли к ним и попросили закурить, ребята сказали, что не курят. После этого одного из мальчиков повели в туалет, все остальные пошли за ним — не бросят же они его, — вспоминает Юлия. Конфликт продолжился около туалета на четвёртом этаже торгового центра. По словам Юлии, толпа агрессивных подростков увеличилась. К моменту, когда ситуация начала выходить из-под контроля, к группе молодых людей подошёл охранник и начал выгонять неспокойных посетителей. — Охранник поздоровался за руку с главным из той гоп-компании. Когда они дошли до первого этажа, в этой группе...

title: Women in jail are ‘far more likely than male prisoners to self-harm’, report reveals
content: Females generally commit crimes out of ‘necessity rather than greed’, which renders them more vulnerable Dóchas Centre is the medium-security women's prison at Mountjoy. Photo: Kyran O'Brien A major report on prisons found women in Irish jails were much more likely to self-harm than their male counterparts. The most recent Sada (Self-harm Assessment and Data Analysis) report, which covers a two-year period, found that over 36pc of women inmates self-harmed in a 12-month period, followed by more than 15pc of women prisoners self-harming the following year. title: 【25卒の文系就活生が選ぶ】「就職人気企業」ランキング! 2位は「大和証券グループ」、1位は?(ねとらぼ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 画像:PIXTA 文化放送キャリアパートナーズ就職情報研究所は、「2025年入社希望者 就職ブランドランキング調査(後半)」の結果を発表しました。 【画像:ランキング30位~1位を見る】 調査は、2024年3月15日~6月30日にかけて、2025年春入社希望の「ブンナビ」会員1万4970人(現大学4年生・現大学院2年生)を対象に行われています。 本記事では、その中から文系学生のランキングを紹介します。どのような企業がランクインしているのでしょうか。さっそくランキングを見ていきましょう!(出典元:文化放送キャリアパートナーズ「2025年入社希望者 就職ブランドランキング調査(後半)を発表」) 第2位は「大和証券グループ」でした。東京都千代田区に本社を構える総合証券グループです。「大和証券」「大和アセットマネジメント」「大和総研」などのグループ企業を傘下に、「リテール」「グローバル・マーケッツ」「グローバル・インベストメント・バンキング」など、幅広い部門を運営しています。 同グループでは、高い目標に挑み続けるプロフェッショナルの集団を目指し、充実した教育プログラムを導入。業務として取り組む「必須プログラム」と、自身の将来のために必要な要素を身につける「選択型プログラム」を提供し、社員の自律的なキャリア形成を後押ししています。 第1位は「伊藤忠商事」でした。東京都港区と大阪市北区に本社を構える大手総合商社です。「繊維」「機械」「金属」「エネルギー・化学品」「食料」「住生活」「情報・金融」「第8」の8つのカンパニーのもと、各事業分野でトレードや事業投資など幅広いビジネスを展開。生活商品関連など、非資源分野のビジネスも手がけており、安定的な収益基盤を構築しています。 伊藤忠商事では、自身の能力開発について上司と面談し、100以上の研修プログラムからニーズに合致する内容を受講できる「キャリアビジョン支援研修」など、さまざまな研修制度を用意。募集部署とのマッチングが成立すればカンパニーを越えた異動ができる「チャレンジキャリア制度」など、キャリアイメージの実現をサポートしているところも魅力です。 センター 生まれた瞬間「小顔でイケメンになるね」と言われた息子...しかし1ヶ月後の姿に「思わず笑っちゃいました」「どっちもかわいすぎます」の声 「当たり屋みたいやからやめなさい」 いぬが散歩中がまさかの行動 「見事な倒れ方」が笑撃的 「なんじゃこりゃ」 ハードオフでジャンク品発見→“思わず目を疑う”値札に「正直過ぎて草生える」 「何が気に食わないんだ塾の迎えだぞ!」大量の違法駐車に困惑 バリケードなどで対抗してもいい? 「おいしいと思えなくて」 フランス人が初訪日で苦手を克服した日本の食べ物とは Yahoo!ニュース ドキュメンタリー 「正解」がない時代に、あなたの生きるチカラになる 5年間毎日「知らない人の家に泊まり続ける男」。旅生活を維持する“YouTube収益の収支”も告白...

title: دنی تراکتوری‌ها آلوز نبود! (عکس)
content: به گزارش "ورزش سه"، دانیال اسماعیلی‌فر، مدافع راست تراکتور با نام مخفف در پشت پیراهنش تصویر جالبی خلق کرد و با توجه به پست مشترکی که با ستاره سابق تیم ملی برزیل و بارسلونا دارد شباهت زیادی پیدا کرد! اسماعیلی‌فر با شماره 11 و اسم مخفف "دنی" مقابل ذوب آهن به میدان رفت، او مثل همیشه سعی داشت پرتلاش در حملات ظاهر شود، اما عملکرد خوب بازیکنان سمت چپ خط دفاعی و پدرام قاضی‌پور فرصت چندانی برای این بازیکن فراهم نکرد تا در حملات نقش‌آفرینی کند. مدافع سابق پرسپولیس یکی از بازیکنان مورد اعتماد دراگان اسکوچیچ است و مهدی شیری، دیگر مدافع سابق پرسپولیس را نیمکت‌نشین کرده است؛ اما با توجه به شرایط مسابقه در دقایق پایانی جای خود را به این بازیکن داد که ورود شیری هم تاثیری در روند مسابقه نداشت. تراکتور اولین باخت فصل خود را مقابل ذوب آهن تجربه کرد و شکست‌ناپذیری آنها در لیگ بیست‌وچهارم در هفته چهارم به پایان رسید.

title: Ankara’da bayi satışı ve e-gazete abone çalışması başlatılacak
content: Millî Gazete Genel Yayın Yönetmeni Mustafa Kurdaş, Millî Gazete Ankara Sorumlusu Ahmet Sesli, Millî Gazete Reklam Müdürü Ertuğrul Köse ve Ankara büro ekibi, Saadet Partisi Genel Muhasebe ve Mali İşler Başkanı ve Ankara İl Başkanı Adnan Simit, iş insanı Celal Asiltürk ve Türk Sanayici ve İş Adamları Vakfı (TÜSİAV) Yönetim Kurulu Başkanı Veli Sarıtoprak’ı ziyaret etti. MİLLİ GAZETE, MİLLİ GÖRÜŞ HAREKETİ İÇİN ÖNEMLİ Ziyarette, Saadet Partisi Genel Muhasebe ve Mali İşler Başkanı ve Ankara İl Başkanı Adnan Simit, İl Teşkilat Başkanı Nevzat Açıkgöz, Siyasi İşler Başkanı Osman Oktay, Eğitim Başkanı Mustafa Aydın, Mali İşler Başkanı Mehmet Bircan, Tanıtım ve Medya Başkanı Mustafa Başpehlivan, Dış İlişkiler Başkanı Erkan Akköse, Planlama Koordinasyon Başkanı Süleyman Canbaz, Halkla İlişkiler Başkanı Seyit Mehmet Karagülle ve Hukuk İşleri Başkanı Ahmet Yazıcı da hazır bulundu. Ziyarette konuşan Simit, Milli Gazete’nin yarım asrı geçen yayıncılık hayatında, eğilip bükülmeden yoluna devam ettiğini belirterek, Milli Görüş hareketi için önemli olduğunun altını çizdi. Simit ayrıca, Milli Gazete’nin Ankara özelinde bayi satışlarında artış sağlanması ve e-gazete anlamında abone çalışmaları gerçekleştireceklerini ifade etti. KURDAŞ, YENİ GÖREVİ İÇİN SİMİT’E HAYIRLI OLSUN TEMENNİSİNDE BULUNDU Milli Gazete Genel Yayın Yönetmeni Mustafa Kurdaş, Saadet Partisi Ankara İl Başkanlığı’na...

title: IMD Warns Of Severe Weather In East, Heavy Rainfall & Flash Flood Risks Across India
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has issued a warning of very heavy to extremely heavy rainfall and a moderate to high risk of flash floods over Gangetic West Bengal, Odisha, and Jharkhand in the next 24 hours. The conditions are expected to worsen with heavy to extremely heavy rainfall anticipated over Chhattisgarh, Bihar, and eastern Madhya Pradesh over the next two days. Deep depression intensifies over Gangetic West Bengal A deep depression has formed over Bangladesh and adjoining Gangetic West Bengal. Currently situated about 90 km northeast of Canning and 100 km east-northeast of Kolkata, this system is moving west-northwest at 23 km/h. It is expected to maintain its intensity through this evening but will likely weaken to a depression as it progresses across Gangetic West Bengal and Jharkhand over the next 48 hours. Deep depression over Gangetic West Bengal remained practically stationary during past 6 hours and near latitude 22.4° N and longitude 88.3° E, about 20 km south-southwest of Kolkata (West Bengal).To move slowly, nearly westwards across Gangetic West Bengal and maintain its... pic.twitter.com/rKYCIal7i6 Severe weather alert for Odisha Odisha is expected to face heavy to very heavy rainfall, particularly in Mayurbhanj, Keonjhar, and Balasore districts, with isolated extreme rainfall over north Odisha. Rainfall of 7-20 cm and thunderstorms with lightning are likely. Flash floods and water logging may occur. Weather in east and northeast India Heavy...

title: Paul Kimmage: Stephen Sweeney reflects on 22 years since a fateful interview at Royal County Down
content: An unlikely assistant pro position set Donegal native on a lucrative career path Stephen Sweeney: ‘Here was this Catholic guy from Donegal pitching for a job at Royal County Down.’ It’s the eve of the Tour Championship in Atlanta and the PGA Tour are making a short video — “Last-minute practice at East Lake” — for their social media feeds. The prelude is a fist bump between Rory McIlroy and Shane Lowry as they prepare to play a match over nine holes. We see them chipping, putting and trading bouquets when they hit brilliant drives.

title: Cast-offs are cool again: Why you should give your cousins your old clothes and not consign them to a charity shop
content: This week’s column is a call to action. Bring back the black bin bags of hand-me-downs, the days of recycling wardrobes through the extended family! Try to find your old clothing a true home that isn’t a charity shop already bursting at the seams Hand-me-downs are hip again in our environmentally-conscious world so rehome clothes you no longer want. Photo: Getty "My favourite person to steal hand-me-downs from is my mam! Here I’m wearing her pink corset from the 1990s in Paris last year, as well as her gold evening purse." - Orla Dempsey As inflation goes up and charity shops now cost only around 10pc less than buying the item new — yes, I know it’s for a good cause, but I majorly question these prices — I miss the days when your relatives would give you cast-offs. My mam and cousin Ashling were my favourites for this. Ashling was older and much cooler than me, with a huge shopping addiction. Half the items in the bag still had tags attached. Plus as a young pre-teen lacking in drama, I quite enjoyed the bitchy school notes that were left behind in the pockets; it was like my very own soap opera. (Apologies for invading your privacy, Ash, but they were too good.) It was a great way to experiment with style, often including pieces you’d never buy yourself. Personally, I’m trying to resurge this by sending a ream of pictures to my friends and sister any time I clean out my wardrobe, with a frantic “U want this???” . A part of me wants to offer them to my younger cousins to...

title: Eoin O’Malley: Let’s not waste €14bn Apple windfall on the bloated public sector
content: The riches coming our way will not make a real difference until blockages are finally addressed Apple has a substantial base in Hollyhill, Cork. Photo: Collins Despite Simon Harris’s consistent denials, everyone seems to think he will call an election next month. Whenever it comes, that election campaign will feature the €14.1bn sitting in an escrow account since 2018 that the European Court of Justice has ruled is owed to the Government by Apple. In the 2016 election there was a lot of talk of “fiscal space” — the amount of money available for new spending or tax cuts. It dominated the campaign. The government at the time was saying there was more money to spend, and the parties campaigned on promises to throw more money around than the other lot. That’s likely to happen again. title: 異端のデータ企業パランティアCEOがウクライナ、ガザ、米大統領選を語る「戦場でのAIの濫用を止められるのはAIだけ」(クーリエ・ジャポン)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 データ解析企業パランティアのアレックス・カープCEO。同社のAI技術はビジネスだけでなく、諜報・軍事にも利用されている Photo by Andreas Rentz/Getty Images AIを使った兵器や監視システムの脅威が増すなか、戦争のあり方はどのように変容していくのか。こうした議論の渦中にいるのが、米国防総省やCIAなど、西側の政府や軍を顧客に持つデータ解析企業パランティアだ。同社の名物CEOアレックス・カープが新しい戦争の形やウクライナ、ガザ情勢、米大統領選まで米紙「ニューヨーク・タイムズ」に語りつくしたインタビュー記事を掲載する。 【画像】異端のデータ企業パランティアCEOがウクライナ、ガザ、米大統領選を語る「戦場でのAIの濫用を止められるのはAIだけ」 謎めいたデータ分析企業パランティア・テクノロジーズのアレックス・カープCEO(56)は、車の運転を習ったことがない。「昔はとても貧乏だったんです。その後は、金持ちになりすぎて必要なくなりました」と彼は言う。実際、車の運転は自分にはとても無理だとカープは感じている。「つい空想にふけってしまって、よく転ぶんです。太極拳を始めてから、ようやくひとつのことに集中できるようになりました。もし15年前にこの取材を受けていたら、話している間の3分の2は心ここにあらずだったでしょうね」いったいどんな空想をしているのだろう? 「そうですね、5年前の散歩のこととか、大学時代にした会話とか。同僚が『あれって本当はどういう意味なんだろう?』と言ったこととか」カープは引き締まった体形の健康的なビリオネアだ。白髪まじりのワイルドな巻き毛で、内向的だが人を惹きつける魅力がある。注意欠陥多動性障害(ADHD)があり、興味のない話題がでるとつまらないと感じていることを隠せない。一気呵成にまくし立てたかと思うと、突然電池が切れる。そんなときは、エクササイズバイクをこいだり、読書をしたりして充電しなければならない。自分が人と違うことに対してはまんざらでもないようで、大勢の前で話すときやインタビューを受けたときは、自ら挑発的な態度をとる。...

title: 車3台が絡む事故 19歳男性が死亡
content: 車3台が絡む事故で運転席が大破 19歳男性が死亡 同乗の15歳女子高校生も病院搬送 「追い越し禁止」の県道で対向車線にはみ出したか 福岡・筑紫野市 福岡県筑紫野市で14日夜、車3台が絡む事故があり軽ワゴン車を運転していた19歳の男性が死亡しました。

title: Libre se apropia de fiestas patrias
creator: Proceso Digital
content: Tegucigalpa – Honduras celebra sus 203 años de independencia y como ha sido normal por casi un siglo, los colegiales desfilan por las principales avenidas del país, pero en la conmemoración en la capital Tegucigalpa, no serán los protagonistas centrales. -Los colegiales que desfilan y las familias, las almas tradicionales de la efimeridad, pasan a segundo plano con las acciones del partido gobernante. -Colectivas y empleados públicos afines a Libre montarán acciones de “control y vigilancia” sobre los familiares, se informó oficialmente. Aunque la celebración es a nivel nacional, todas las ciudades y municipios celebran la festividad patria con los desfiles estudiantiles, la atención nacional y mediática se concentra en los desfiles de Tegucigalpa, donde miles de colegiales desfilan a lo largo de un bulevar, en los últimos años el Suyapa, y luego ingresan al estadio nacional para realizar su presentación principal ante las autoridades gubernamentales, en este caso ante la presidenta Castro. Aunque la celebración es a nivel nacional, todas las ciudades y municipios celebran la festividad patria con los desfiles estudiantiles, la atención nacional y mediática se concentra en los desfiles de Tegucigalpa, donde miles de colegiales desfilan a lo largo de un bulevar, en los últimos años el Suyapa, y luego ingresan al estadio nacional para realizar su presentación principal ante las autoridades gubernamentales, en este caso ante la presidenta Castro. title: Three new awards up for grabs in the Innovation Arena at the Ploughing Championships
content: Partner Content: The National Ploughing Championships take place at Ratheniska, Co Laois, on September 17-19 Erwin Stanley of Ballacolla, Co Laois, with a heifer at Ratheniska for the National Ploughing Championships. Photo: Frank McGrath Anna Marie McHugh, MD of the National Ploughing Association. Photo: Frank McGrath Irish innovators who are shaping the future of agriculture will this week be centre stage, as business leaders and decision-makers from the global agritech ­community visit Ireland for the National Ploughing Championships. Ireland’s rich agricultural heritage, coupled with our reputation as a global innovation hub, has meant that a strong pipeline of agri-tech solutions is emerging, and many of these companies are rapidly becoming international leaders in their field. We will celebrate the pioneering people who work to optimise and future-proof our agri-businesses Enterprise Ireland is committed to supporting innovative Irish companies as they scale and grow internationally, and that includes working with cutting-edge agri-tech businesses and innovators. The Innovation Arena at the Ploughing is an important exhibition platform, showing these cutting-edge innovations to a large audience. This year is the 11th year of the Innovation Arena, delivered in partnership with the National Ploughing Association, and it will showcase new solutions in animal science and technology, agri-engineering, digital technologies, food security, animal health and nutrition,...

title: Obituary: Dave Fenton, garda, talented sportman and brave RNLI volunteer with a great sense of humour who saved lives on both land and sea
content: Colleagues say Dave Fenton was a ‘great man to have in your corner’ Dave Fenton. Photo: RNLI / Nathan Williams Dave Fenton, who has died unexpectedly at the age of 41, was an experienced garda who saved lives on both land and sea as he was also a volunteer with the RNLI in west Cork. The father of three was an accomplished sportsman and active member of his community, and served as both deputy coxswain and deputy mechanic with the RNLI Castletownbere station. He was involved in many rescues, some of which were featured on the BBC’s Saving Lives at Sea television series, and won two Water Safety Ireland awards. Only several weeks before his death, he was a mechanic on the crew of the Annette Hutton which launched to assist a 40-foot fishing boat with two people on board that had got into difficulties. Dave Fenton was born in Castlecove, south Kerry on July 24, 1983, and was one of three sons reared by Mike and Anne Fenton. He was successful at whatever he put his mind to from an early age, and won a number of coastal rowing awards when he was a teenager at school in Waterville and at Coláiste na Sceilge in Cahirsiveen. Having studied agriculture for a year, he opted to join An Garda Síochána in January 2004, and was stationed in Mallow, Co Cork, Bray, Co Wicklow, and then Castletownbere fishery harbour for the past 17 years. Among his many sporting achievements were winning minor and senior county medals and an all-Ireland coastal rowing medal at the age of 16 as part of a...

title: There’s been a huge 270pc rise in number of employers caught flouting the new laws on tipping
content: Businesses must display a tips and gratuities notice, to tell customers how tips are distributed. Photo: Getty The number of contraventions detected of a new law aimed at ensuring businesses pass on customer tips to their staff has almost tripled this year. Workplace Relations Commission (WRC) inspectors found 542 contraventions of the Payment of Wages (Amendment) (Tips and Gratuities) Act 2022 between January and August, up from 199 in the first eight months of 2023 and 464 for the entirety of last year. title: Keith Barry: ‘We’ve got to reduce those stress hormones down... in about 20 years’ time, people are going to realise we’re all f**ked in the head’
content: Hypnotist and author Keith Barry on finding his ‘sleep why’, the power of family, and the constant pressure of performing the next big thing Mentalist Keith Barry's new book ‘Sleep Hacks’ will be published on September 19. Photo: Frank McGrath Keith Barry is describing a normal week. “I got up at half two the night before last,” he says, then stops, and goes further back. “Last Friday, I flew to Ohio, landed that night, got up Saturday morning, rehearsed for a gig for the NFL, did the gig that night, flew out Sunday, got home Monday, worked Monday, worked Tuesday, then Wednesday got up at half two in the morning, drove down to Tramore, Waterford, walked a half an hour to a fishing spot in the middle of the night. Dark. On my own. I just fished away on my own for four hours and then drove back up. Then worked again. That’s why I need to get optimal levels of sleep. It’s because I can’t function like that if I’m not sleeping.” In the opening sections of his new book, Sleep Hacks: Discover the Life-Changing Tranquillity of Deep Sleep , Barry outlines how important it is, in the search for good sleep, to identify your why, beyond simply “I’m tired”. You need to go deeper, asking: what is it you need more sleep to achieve? Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel Stay up to date with all the latest news

title: “I don’t see the person about to knife me. I think it’s a one-off... Then it happens again.’ David McWilliams on office politics
content: He says his new book is really a study of human behaviour Economist, author and consummate multi-tasker David McWilliams. Photo: Gerry Mooney Back in the days when David McWilliams was in fifth year, he had a summer job in a paint factory in Sutton. His father worked there as a lab technician. “I can remember lifting paint cans,” he says. “People forget that a factory is basically a digestive system. Stuff comes in and then it goes out the other end. I was on the edge of a big warehouse. I remember spending 10 or 11 hours a day lifting paint cans onto pallets. title: Mary O’Connor: We have to increase funding for grassroots bodies if we are to develop the next wave of Olympic talent
content: Rhys McClenaghan on his way to winning gold at the Olympic Games in Paris. Photo: Naomi Baker/Getty x The wonderful Paris Games we experienced this summer added to the lustre of what it means to compete at the highest level and just how much a medal means to athletes and the national pride it brings. Ireland enjoyed its best-ever Olympics — seven medals won at the Games and a further six at the Paralympics, with personal bests and national records set along the way. It was a remarkable achievement as Team Ireland did us proud. Over 200 countries competed in Paris with Ireland in 19th place in the medals table, our highest ranking ever at the Olympics. While there were many reasons for our success in Paris, successive governments have had a major role to play, as indeed have Sport Ireland, the Sport Ireland Institute, Paralympics Ireland and the Olympic Federation of Ireland. We only need to go back three Olympic cycles to see the then Minister for Sport asking why New Zealand, a similar country to Ireland in population and with a dominant sport (rugby as opposed to Gaelic games), could bring home 18 medals from the Rio Olympics while we won two. The government decided to do something about it and the National Sports Policy 2018-2027, a 10-year strategic plan for sport in Ireland, came into being. The plan laid out the actions that would need to be taken to develop sport at all levels and came with a commitment from government to double funding for sport over the life of the...

title: Are you too stingy or a pushover? How to navigate your way around the new tipping culture
content: New legislation and digital tipping options have created confusion over tipping A payment terminal pre-programmed with tipping options. title: The peaceful London park perfect for a beautiful autumn walk
creator: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com (Léonie Benhamouche)
content: With autumn just around the corner, crisp mornings, falling leaves and all things pumpkin will soon be our reality. And on the chilly but sunny days that are so emblematic of the season, walks are the perfect activity. As London is full of great outdoor spaces, finding somewhere to go isn't a difficult task. But a particularly scenic spot is the Brompton Cemetery . Managed by The Royal Parks, it's located just a short walk from Kensington Palace. Not only is it a favourite spot for locals looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of the capital, it is also one of the Magnificent Seven - a group of private cemeteries formed in the 19th century. READ MORE: The quiet country retreat most Londoners haven't heard of As you stroll through the cemetery, you may come across some familiar names. Leading women's rights activist Emmeline Pankhurst and pioneer John Snow, who proved that cholera was spread by infected water, are amongst those buried there. As well as peace and tranquillity, you'll find an abundance of flora and fauna. Birds, butterflies, bats, lime trees and many more make their home in Brompton Cemetery. You can sign up to get the most exciting events to the new bars and restaurants in London sent straight to your WhatsApp from the MyLondon team. To sign up, you need to already have WhatsApp. All you need to do is click this link and select 'join community'. No one will be able to see who is signed up and no one can send messages except the MyLondon team. We also...

title: Sorteo Especial de la Lotería Nacional: ¿Cuáles son los premios que se darán el 15 de septiembre?
creator: Ana Paula Rodríguez
content: ana.rodriguez@comercio.com.pe Este 15 de septiembre se celebrará el Gran Sorteo Especial 291 a las 16:00 horas con una emisión de 3,000,000 de billetes. Para participar solo debes comprar tu cachito en cualquier punto de venta, con tu vendedor de billetes de confianza o desde nuestro sitio oficial de venta en línea www.alegrialoteria.com . En caso de que ya hayas participado, te compartimos la lista de premios que te puedes llevar a casa. Este sorteo especial tendrá premios de lujos tanto en especie como en efectivo, con un valor total de $252,113,096.00 (Doscientos cincuenta y dos millones ciento trece mil noventa y seis pesos 10/100 M.N.). En este sorteo todos los premios son garantizados. PREMIOS EN EFECTIVO PREMIOS EN ESPECIE: Si resultaste ganador de algún premio, La Lotería Nacional te invita a acudir a sus oficinas ubicadas en Plaza de la República No. 117, Edificio Jalisco, Primer Piso, Alcaldía Cuauhtémoc, C.P. 06030, Ciudad de México, o al punto de venta más cercano con una identificación oficial vigente y el cachito ganador. Podrás cobrar tu premio dentro de los 60 días naturales posteriores a la celebración del sorteo.

title: 함익병 딸, 2차 폭로 “父같은 사람이랑 결혼하면 힘들다”(‘아빠하고’)
क्या स्टार की वाइफ होने का फायदा मिलता है?:एक्ट्रेस पत्रलेखा बोलीं- सिर्फ राजकुमार राव की वाइफ नहीं, मेरी खुद की भी पहचान है
content: हाल ही में वेब सीरीज 'IC- 814 कंधार हाईजैक' की रिलीज के साथ चर्चा में आईं एक्ट्रेस पत्रलेखा ने दैनिक भास्कर से खास बातचीत की। उन्होंने साफ कहा कि वो 'राजकुमार राव की वाइफ' के टैग से दूरी बनाकर खुद की पहचान बनाना चाहती हैं। पत्रलेखा ने अपने दम पर इंडस्ट्री में नाम कमाने की चाहत और स्ट्रगल के बारे में भी बात की। खुशी है कि हम एक ही इंडस्ट्री से हैं जब उनसे पूछा गया कि क्या वे और राजकुमार राव अपने प्रोजेक्ट्स पर बात करते हैं, तो पत्रलेखा ने कहा, 'अक्सर ऐसा नहीं होता, क्योंकि कई बार स्क्रिप्ट इतनी बेहतरीन होती है या निर्देशक ऐसे होते हैं जिनके साथ काम करना ही होता है, तो बिना कुछ कहे या डिस्कस हामी भर देते हैं। हां, जब कभी दुविधा होती है, तब हम जरूर डिस्कस करते हैं। इस बात की खुशी है कि हम एक ही इंडस्ट्री से हैं।' राजकुमार के कंधों पर बैठकर अपना नाम नहीं बनाना चाहती बातचीत के दौरान, पत्रलेखा ने खुलासा किया कि उन्हें कई बार 'राजकुमार राव की वाइफ' के टैग से प्रोजेक्ट्स ऑफर होते हैं। उन्होंने कहा, 'मुझे इस टैग से बहुत तकलीफ होती है। मैं ज्यादा कोशिश करती हूं कि मैं अपना स्पेस बनाऊं और खुद को इतना मजबूत कर लूं कि कोई कुछ ना बोल पाए। मैं उनके कंधों पर बैठकर अपना नाम नहीं बनाना चाहती हूं। इसी वजह से मैं अपने होमटाउन, शिलॉन्ग से निकल गई थी क्योंकि मैं अपने पापा के कंधों पर बैठकर भी अपना नाम नहीं बनाना चाहती थी।' खुद की पहचान बनाने की चाहत उन्होंने आगे कहा, 'ये कोई फेमिनिज्म वाली बात है या नहीं, लेकिन मुझे इस टैग से प्रॉब्लम है, मैं इस टैग से दूर भागती हूं। नहीं तो मैं बहुत सारे प्रोजेक्ट्स कर सकती थी, है ना? पर मैं उनके कंधों पर बैठकर अपना नाम नहीं बनाना चाहती हूं।' याद भी नहीं कि हमने...

title: नगरजवळ पांढरी पुलावर अपघातांची मालिका, मध्यरात्रीनंतर 8 तासात तीन आपघात; चौघे गंभीर जखमी
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: नगर-छत्रपती संभाजीनगर महामार्गावर पांढरी पूल येथे शुक्रवारी मध्यरात्री 12.30 ते शनिवारी सकाळी 8 वाजेपर्यंत तीन अपघात झाले. यामध्ये चारजण गंभीर जखमी झाले. या अपघातात सुदैवाने कुठल्याही प्रकारची जीवितहानी झाली नसली, तरी एका दुकानासह वाहनांचे लाखो रुपयांचे नुकसान झाले आहे. पहिला अपघात शुक्रवारी मध्यरात्री 12.30 वाजता झाला. चेन्नई येथून माल घेऊन गुजरातला निघालेल्या गाडीवरील चालकाचे नियंत्रण सुटल्याने ती रस्त्याकडेला नव्यानेच सुरू झाल्याने हार्डवेअरच्या दुकानात घुसली. त्यामध्ये लाखोंचे नुकसान झाले. दुसरा अपघात पहाटे 5.30 वाजण्याच्या सुमारास घडला. मुंबईहून एक मालट्रक नगरमार्गे छत्रपती संभाजीनगरकडे जात असताना घाटात ब्रेक नादुरुस्त झाले. त्यामुळे ती समोर भाजीपाला घेऊन चाललेल्या टेम्पोला पाठीमागून धडक दिली. त्यातच पुढे तो टेम्पो तामीळनाडू येथील अपघातग्रस्त ट्रक दिसून न आल्याने त्यावर जाऊन आदळला. तिसरा अपघात सकाळी 8 वाजण्याच्या सुमारास झाला असून, समोरचे अपघातग्रस्त वाहन न दिसल्याने एक ट्रक त्यावर जाऊन आदळला. या अपघातामध्ये वाहनांचा अक्षरशः चक्काचूर झाला. सुदैवाने यात कोणतीही जीवितहानी झाली नाही. अपघातानंतर चार तास वाहतूक ठप्प झाल्याने वाहनधारकांना मोठा मनस्ताप सहन करावा लागला. उपाययोजना करा , सात गावांचे ठराव या ठिकाणी दर आठ दिवसाला एकतरी अपघात होत असतो. त्यामुळे या ठिकाणी उपाययोजना कराव्यात, या मागणीचा ठराव परिसरातील वांजुळी, खोसपुरी, पांगरमल, मजले चिंचोली, उदरमल, आव्हाडवाडी, इमामपूर ग्रामपंचायत यांच्या वतीने सार्वजनिक बांधकाम विभागास देणार आहेत. यापूर्वीदेखील अनेक वेळा संबंधित बांधकाम विभागास ठराव देऊनही कारवाई केली जात नाही. या ठिकाणी वारंवार होणाऱ्या अपघातांमध्ये अनेक निष्पाप...

title: Censored: The online criticism Sinn Féin is trying to hide
content: Senior party members are selecting the social media replies they want to shield from the public Staff are most protective of Mary Lou McDonald and Pearse Doherty For more than three months, Sinn Féin has been quietly censoring criticism of the party — and even some praise. Analysis by the Sunday Independent shows how the practice was started by Mary Lou McDonald in June, then followed by her party. It has gone to considerable effort to hide claims that it is soft on immigration, is cynically changing position in an attempt to win back votes and is part of the establishment. title: Triona McCarthy: Get Ready With Me and try my minimalist faves to brighten up your face (and spirits)
‘It’s just outrageous’ – House owned by Department of Education has been vacant for over six years
content: Councillors say it is ‘unacceptable’ that home not available in midst of housing crisis The front of the house at 149 Harold's Cross Road in Dublin. Photo: Frank McGrath Integration Minister Roderic O’Gorman has asked departments to make buildings available The house has boarded-up windows and graffiti on its walls. Photo: Frank McGrath Councillors in Harold’s Cross in Dublin say it is “outrageous” and “unacceptable” that a three-­storey house bought by the Department of ­Education in 2018 has been left abandoned over the last six years. Number 149 Harold’s Cross Road, which has boarded-up windows and graffiti on its walls, was bought by the department as part of a €23m purchase of the adjacent racetrack from ­Greyhound Racing Ireland. The house, located on the left of the main entrance to the old greyhound track, which now hosts two Educate ­Together schools in temporary buildings, has been left derelict since the deal was completed in 2018. Eoin Hayes, a Social Democrats councillor, said Harold’s Cross has seen an under-investment in new and refurbished housing. He said the non-use of Number 149 by the department for any kind of housing over the last six years was wrong. “In my view it’s outrageous for any property to be vacant or derelict for longer than a period of six months in the middle of a housing crisis,” said Mr Hayes. “It’s just outrageous and it’s particularly galling when that’s being done by a public body.” There are solutions and they have to start with state...

title: 🍳 Basmati rice rules! India’s new crown and more...
content: Hey folks! Something strange is happening in India’s healthcare sector. Private equity firms are snapping up majority stakes in hospital chains. For instance, Temasek recently acquired a 59% stake in Manipal Hospitals, while Blackstone took control of CARE Hospitals and Kerala’s KIMS. And this is just the tip of the iceberg. Many more hospital chains are catching the eye of private equity investors. But why is this happening? And what does it mean for you and me? Find out in ! With that out of the way, let’s skip to the rest of the edition. Ever considered farming as a career or even a post-retirement plan? Well, turns out , the former England football captain, has embraced a passion for it! He’s now growing kale, tending flowers and even extracting honey at home. But it got us thinking — how do people, especially younger generations, view farming today? Across the globe, the without younger replacements. In the US, the average farmer is 58 years old. In Japan, it’s 67. And one-third of European farmers are over 65. The situation is similar in India, where less than 0.5% of undergraduates enrol in agricultural courses. With older farmers retiring and fewer younger people stepping in, we could face a major food crisis. But what if the younger generation and skills to farming? Maybe even on a small scale — growing food on your balcony or terrace? David Beckham’s into it. Maybe you could be next? by Charan Raj You can thank our reader Manvitha for this beautiful rec. title: Auto advice: What should drivers know about how to tow safely?
content: Reversing with a trailer can be challenging, especially if you’re new to it. The secret is to take it slow and steady. Photo: Getty Our motoring editor answers your questions on different towing licences and what you need to know before towing. If you have a category B driving licence, you can tow a small trailer. If you want to tow a larger trailer, you must have a category BE licence. Even if your driving licence entitles you to tow a trailer, the type of trailer will also depend on your vehicle specifications. The owner’s manual generally sets out a towing capacity or towing weight for the vehicle. Some small vehicles might not be allowed to tow any trailer, while larger vehicles have restrictions set by the manufacturer. Towing capacity is the max weight a vehicle can tow in accordance with the design specifications of the manufacturer. Yes, when towing, you’ll need to adjust to lower speed limits. The maximum legal speed limit for a vehicle drawing a trailer on any road is 80kmh unless a lower speed limit sign is posted. Reversing with a trailer can be challenging, especially if you’re new to it. The secret is to take it slow and steady. Begin by practising in a spacious, empty area like a car park or an open field. Keep in mind that when reversing with a trailer, you need to turn the steering wheel in the opposite direction you would normally turn if you weren’t towing. It might feel a bit unnatural at first, but with a little practice, it’ll soon become second nature....

title: Arne Slot receives first unwanted lesson as Liverpool fail to find familiar Klopp-era trait
content: Nottingham Forest's Callum Hudson-Odoi scores the winner during the Premier League match at Anfield. Photo: Peter Byrne/PA Wire A historic occasion on Merseyside, just not the sort Arne Slot could celebrate. On a day when he could have become the first Liverpool manager ever to begin their reign with four wins, each garnished with a clean sheet, Nottingham Forest instead celebrated the victory that had eluded them at Anfield since 1969. Callum Hudson-Odoi delivered a result that even Brian Clough’s European Cup-winning teams could not muster. As Liverpool paid tribute to Ron Yeats, after one of their greatest captains died at 86, Forest tasted victory at Anfield for the first time since beating a side that included the fearsome defender. For Slot, though, there was the kind of rarity he must hope does not become a regularity. Jurgen Klopp only lost one league game at Anfield in each of his final two seasons in charge, none in the year before that. Slot has now been beaten at the second attempt. More worryingly, perhaps, Nuno Espirito Santo may have found a blueprint to play against the Dutchman’s side. If one explanation is simply that Liverpool were poor, sluggish when they needed to be sharp with distinctly below-par performances from Dominik Szoboszlai, Trent Alexander-Arnold and Mohamed Salah, a reason why they were a shadow of the side who cruised to victory over Manchester United lay in Forest’s tactics. Liverpool lacked both fluency and control as Forest congested the...

title: FAI receive 38 complaints in wake of 1990s abuse scandal as David Courell defends Hallgrimsson methods
content: FAI interim chief executive David Courell during the Football Association of Ireland's annual general meeting at the Radisson Blu St Helen's Hotel in Dublin. Photo: Tyler Miller/Sportsfile FAI president Paul Cooke during the FAI's annual general meeting at the Radisson Blu St Helen's Hotel in Dublin. Photo: Tyler Miller/Sportsfile The FAI’s independent complaint handling firm has received 38 contacts since it launched in July when a dozen female footballers came forward in joint Sunday Independent/RTÉ Investigates reports to reveal allegations that they were subject to abusive behaviour by coaches in the 1990s. Speaking after the FAI’s AGM in Stillorgan yesterday, interim CEO David Courell said Raiseaconcern, the independent firm that deals with complaints from players and coaches, has now received 38 complaints. The complaints range from people raising governance issues to new allegations of “serious sexual abuse”. “The first point I’d like to make is that the Raiseaconcern service that we introduced is working, and I think that needs to be recognised,” said Courell. “We put it in place for this very purpose. So, to date, we’ve had 38 approaches to the service. But as Aoife [Rafferty, FAI head of HR], will have outlined earlier, they are across the spectrum of different areas, from governance to harassment to bullying to abuse.” Courell said the number of complaints about governance was in double figures. “It is working,” he said. “While it’s difficult to see these cases...

title: 相続税で土地の評価が難しい...まずは親に所有の土地を聞いておこう イマサラQ&A 100歳時代の歩き方(産経新聞)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/15(日) 10:30 配信 Q 前回、土地は財産と聞きました。評価額はどう調べるのですかA 毎年、土地のある自治体から郵送される固定資産税の納税通知書に課税明細書が同封されています。ここに載っている固定資産税評価額に7分の8を掛けた額が、相続税上の大まかな評価額になります。全体像をつかむ際には、この額で計算できますQ それなら自分でも評価できますねA 7分の8を掛けた額はあくまで目安です。土地の評価は相続税で最も難しいとされています。一般的な戸建て住宅が建っている宅地の場合は、路線価方式か倍率方式で評価しますQ その土地がどちらの方式かは、どうしたら分かりますかA 国税庁のホームページで調べられます。倍率方式の場合は「1・1」などの倍率が記載され、固定資産税評価額にこの倍率を掛けたものが相続税の評価額になります。路線価方式の場合は路線価図を使って評価します。宅地の奥行きや形などによって路線価を補正する必要があり、複雑です。ちなみに東京23区は路線価方式です。田畑や山林などの評価は、やや専門的な知識を要します。現地調査や測量が必要になる場合もありますQ 親が地方の山林など、自宅以外に土地を所有しているかどうかが分かりませんA 自宅に書類が残されていれば分かります。少しでも話を聞いていれば、その土地がある自治体に問い合わせることができます。いずれにしても、どのような土地を所有しているのかは生前、親に聞いておくことをお勧めしますQ 自宅以外の土地があったら、自分で評価する自信がありませんA そのような場合は税理士に依頼したほうがよいと思いますQ 自宅の家屋はどのように評価しますかA 家屋は土地より分かりやすいです。自宅の家屋は固定資産税評価額がそのまま相続税の評価額になります(回答者 税理士 福田真弓) 生まれた瞬間「小顔でイケメンになるね」と言われた息子...しかし1ヶ月後の姿に「思わず笑っちゃいました」「どっちもかわいすぎます」の声 「当たり屋みたいやからやめなさい」 いぬが散歩中がまさかの行動 「見事な倒れ方」が笑撃的 「なんじゃこりゃ」 ハードオフでジャンク品発見→“思わず目を疑う”値札に「正直過ぎて草生える」 「何が気に食わないんだ塾の迎えだぞ!」大量の違法駐車に困惑 バリケードなどで対抗してもいい? 「おいしいと思えなくて」 フランス人が初訪日で苦手を克服した日本の食べ物とは 5年間毎日「知らない人の家に泊まり続ける男」。旅生活を維持する“YouTube収益の収支”も告白 テレビではカットされる「元気すぎる高齢タレント」の「衝撃的な真実」 雑草だらけの庭にならないために。予算がない家づくりでプロがしたこと 時計はロレックス、車はベンツ、親の年金25万円で暮らす「53歳の働かない息子」...何不自由のない生活が突如終了「何かの間違いでは?」 ブラジャーやショーツの「透け」はどれくらい気になる?一番透けにくい下着の色と形をプロが紹介!【40代下着の悩み】

title: Hawkeyes: Iowa overcomes sloppy first half, downs Troy
creator: JIM NELSON Courier Sports Editor
content: IOWA CITY – The social media world was buzzing at halftime. Iowa, the 23 1⁄2 point favorite over Troy, was trailing 14-10 after the first 30 minutes of play Saturday at Kinnick Stadium and if you were online the Hawkeyes were doomed. Fortunately, football games are 60-minutes long and Iowa turned things around in the second half. Iowa' Deontae Craig leaps for the loose ball after teammate Max Llewelyn causes Troy quarterback Matthew Caldwell to fumble during the first quarter on Saturday September14, 2024. Troy quarterback Tucker Kilcrease has to hurry his throw as Max Llewellyn of Iowa rushes during the fourth quarter against Troy on Saturday September14, 2024. Kaleb Johnson rushed for 173 yards and two touchdowns, and Jemari Harris returned an interception for a touchdown as the Hawkeyes rallied for a 38-21 victory over the Trojans. “Not the biggest story, we played better in the second half,” Iowa coach Kirk Ferentz said. “Left the door open a lot in the first half. That was a bit of a challenge.” The victory improved Iowa to 2-1 as it heads into Minnesota and Big Ten-week prep. “For us, we had to collect ourselves in the locker room and go out there and do the same things we were doing in the first half, but do them better, execute a little more each and every time,” offensive lineman Mason Richman said. Iowa righted course quickly in the third quarter. Back-up quarterback Brenden Sullivan threw his first touchdown as a Hawkeye since transferring from Northwestern on a...

title: Floods in Romania leave four dead as central Europe deluged by rain
content: Flooded farmland in Galati County, Romania. Photo: Reuters At least four people died and thousands of homes were damaged by flooding in eastern Romania yesterday, as surging river levels put authorities on alert in much of central and eastern Europe following days of torrential rain. More rainfall is forecast in the coming days in the Czech Republic, Poland, Slovakia, Hungary, southern Germany and parts of Austria, leading officials in some areas to implement emergency flood preparations. title: New parents in line for budget boost as minister pushes for benefit increases
content: Heather Humphreys seeking hike to help those with newborns Social Protection Minister Heather Humphreys. Photo: PA Minister for Public Expenditure Paschal Donohoe and Minister for Finance Jack Chambers New parents are in line for at least a €20-a-week boost from Budget 2025. Fine Gael aims to help families, with the promise of energy credits and a public childcare model, among other benefits. Social Protection Minister Heather Humphreys will push for at least a €20 weekly increase in maternity, paternity and parents’ benefits when she sits down with Public Expenditure Minister Paschal Donohoe this week. A significant increase in the three payments, which are made to parents with new children, is expected to be the centrepiece of the social protection budget. “Minister Humphreys is very strongly of the view that maternity benefit needs to be very significantly increased,” a government source said last week. “These are people who pay PRSI, they’re workers, and they should be encouraged to take time off to spend with their children.” Minister for Public Expenditure Paschal Donohoe and Minister for Finance Jack Chambers Maternity leave benefit is paid for 26 weeks at €274 a week. Parents’ benefit is also €274 a week and is paid for nine weeks, up from the previous seven. Parental leave can be taken during the first two years of the child’s life. Paternity leave benefit is also paid at the same weekly rate, but for only two weeks within the first six months of the child’s life....

title: 37 year old beats fatty liver condition with unbelievable weight loss - The Times of India
Barbados coroner rules cocaine played role in Emma McManus death, despite battle to halt verdict
content: Ruling on the death of the daughter-in-law of JP McManus was delayed by lengthy legal battle The late Emma McManus with her husband John and father-in-law JP in 2011. Photo: Don MacMonagle A Barbados coroner’s inquest has concluded that cocaine use played a role in the “unnatural” death in 2020 of Emma McManus, the 40-year-old daughter-in-law of Irish horse-racing tycoon JP McManus. The finding has been strongly disputed by the McManus family who say the coroner has issued his verdict in breach of an undertaking not to do so while a McManus family legal appeal is ongoing. title: Thinking inside the box: Managers and players more aware of where the goals are most likely to come from
content: ‘Pep Guardiola is the most influential manager of modern times.’ Photo: Oli Scarff/Getty Only 11.5 per cent of goals scored in the Premier League last season came from outside the penalty area, the lowest figure Opta has recorded since the Premiership broke away from the Football League in 1992. That’s not a one-off: there have been fluctuations but the general trend over the past two decades has been a decline in the proportion of goals scored from long range. Which raises the obvious question of why? Is this the most clear-cut evidence of the impact of data on football?

title: مسعود ریگی؛ یاغی بی سروصدا!
content: به گزارش خبرورزشی، مسعود ریگی زادهٔ ۳ اسفند ۱۳۶۹ در شیراز است. طایفه ریگی از مشهورترین طوایف بلوچ ایرانی هستند و اصالت او هم به استان سیستان و بلوچستان و شهرستان میرجاوه برمی گردد. ریگی در فارس پا به توپ شد، از مشهد به لیگ برتر آمد و یکی از معدود بازیکنانی است که پیراهن هر ۳ مدعی قهرمانی یعنی استقلال، پرسپولیس و سپاهان را پوشیده است! زندگی ورزشی ریگی از جالب ترین نمونه هاست و برعکس اتفاقات عجیب و غریبی که برایش افتاده خود او شخصیت بسیار آرامی دارد. مسعود در دوران مدرسه به فوتبال علاقه مند شد اما بازی باشگاهی و جدی را از ۱۶ سالگی شروع کرد. پس از یک تیم محلی در شیراز، سال ۱۳۸۶ وقتی ۱۶ ساله بود جذب تیم جوانان باشگاه فجر سپاسی شیراز شد و دو سال بعد در سال ۸۸ به بزرگسالان رسید. البته او تا سال ۸۹ کماکان برای جوانان بازی و با بزرگسالان تمرین می کرد. سال ۱۳۸۹ ریگی برای داشتن امکان بازی به مدت یکسال به باشگاه پیام مخابرات فارس رفت اما آنجا هم فرصت به او نرسید! سال ۱۳۹۰ به فجرسپاسی برگشت و شرایطی که پس از سقوط فجر به لیگ آزادگان ایجاد شده بود، عملا به نفع جوانانی چون مسعود شد. تا وقتی فجر در لیگ برتر حضور داشت، (لیگ نهم) بازیکنان سطح بالا برای گذران خدمت سربازی به شیراز آمده و پیراهن فجر و فرصت بازی به جوانانی چون ریگی نمی رسید اما پس از سقوط به لیگ یک شرایط برای او مهیا شد و ریگی بلافاصله پس از دیپلم، ترجیح داد دفترچه آماده بخدمت بگیرد و در فجر سپاسی سربازی خود را هم طی کند. از سال ۱۳۹۰ تا سال ۱۳۹۵ ریگی با لباس فجر در سطح دوم فوتبال ایران بازی کرد. تابستان ۹۵ به تیم بادران رفت و دو سال برای این تیم بازی کرد اما نتوانست به لیگ برتر برسد تا اینکه تابستان ۱۳۹۷ بالاخره طلسم شکست و...

title: Conor Skehan: How property became a status symbol for the Irish
content: The housing issues Ireland is facing are unprecedented. Photo: Getty Those commemorative plaques on city buildings, telling where famous people once lived, carry another important lesson. Throughout history, most people, wealthy and poor, rented their homes. After 1800, Dublin’s huge ­Georgian houses were usually rented, initially just for the few weeks when the landed classes came to Dublin for “The Season”. Later, the Dublin of WB Yeats and James Joyce was filled with renters who were civil servants, professionals and business owners, as well as those artists to whom plaques are erected. Almost none of our ­heroes owned property. Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel Stay up to date with all the latest news

title: Appointment of Niall Ó Ceallacháin shows Dublin hurlers prepared to do it for themselves
content: Na Fianna manager Niall Ó Ceallacháin, who was appointed Dublin's new senior hurling manager last Tuesday. Photo: Stephen Marken/Sportsfile The news of Anthony Daly’s appointment as Dublin hurling manager in November 2008 spread like wildfire within the local hurling community. His typically exuberant arrival began a pattern of managerial appointments from outside the county, only interrupted by Pat Gilroy, who managed for one season in 2018. That Gilroy was considered a leftfield appointment is ironic, being a native though more football-oriented. After Daly exited in 2014, Ger Cunningham had a spell and then Mattie Kenny succeeded Gilroy, in turn replaced by Micheál Donoghue.

title: Case against 10 persons, including three women, on the charge of insulting Dalit woman in Yadgir
content: The Narayanapur police on Saturday registered a case against 10 persons, including three women, on the charge of insulting a Dalit woman at Bapparagi village in Hunsagi taluk of Yadgir district on September 12. The accused have been named as Shankaragouda, Chandappa, Eranna, Yallalinga, Muddamma, Erabayi, Basanth, Ashok, Bandappa, and Shantavva. The police said that on September 12, when the woman went to purchase groceries, the accused insulted her by naming her caste, and the female shop owner, who is also accused in the case, denied her groceries. According to reports, this is the latest twist in a saga that began on August 12, when the Dalit woman filed a complaint that her minor daughter was raped by a member of the ‘upper caste’ community after he had promised to marry her. The woman complained that he later reneged on his promise. Following the complaint, the Narayanapur police on August 12 registered a case against the accused, identified as Chandrasekhar, under relevant sections of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO), and the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act, and arrested him. Following this, the ‘upper caste’ community allegedly decided to carry out a “social boycott” against members of the Dalit community in the village and instructed grocery shops, hotels, and flour mill owners not to conduct any business with Dalits, according to reports. Following reports of the boycott,...

title: Army inquiry fails to uncover how horse tested positive for sedative after competition
content: Drug could have “exposed horse or rider to serious injury” The horse sedative can be used in a range of situations. Photo: Getty It is thought the sedative may been administered to the wrong animal. Photo: Getty The Irish Defence Forces have said they were mystified by one of their horses failing a drug test, with the Army Equitation School commanding officer saying it would have made no sense to give the animal a sedative — as it was already “lazy by nature”. The horse, LMK Derry, tested positive for the presence of a medication called Sedaline after a Dublin Horse Show qualifier competition in Lurgan, Co Armagh, last May. A letter from the Army Equitation School said that, following an exhaustive investigation, they had been unable to find out how the medication was administered to the horse. ‘Knowingly administering such a medication would be reckless and dangerous’ Lt Col Tom Freyne, the commanding officer at the Army Equitation School, also said that giving the medication to LMK Derry before a competition could have resulted in injury to either the horse or rider. In a letter to the Defence Forces HQ, he wrote: “This medication would have no beneficial effect on LMK Derry. That particular horse is lazy by nature and a sedative would only exacerbate the situation. “I would contend that knowingly administering such a medication would be reckless and dangerous, possibly exposing both horse and rider to serious injury.” Lt Co Freyne also said it was unfair that Lt Michaeli...

title: 400年の歴史誇る大津祭、ロンドンへ 現地で祭り再現 喜ぶ関係者
content: 国の に指定されている「大津祭(まつり)」が、この秋初めて海外で披露されることになった。晴れの舞台はロンドン。大津祭に携わってきた関係者らは、今から期待に胸を高鳴らせている。 大津祭は天孫神社( 京町3丁目)の例祭。からくりを載せた豪華絢爛(けんらん)な曳山(ひきやま)13基が神社周辺を巡る「曳山巡行」が見どころで、400年近い歴史がある。大津祭曳山連盟によると、大津祭を海外で披露するのは初めて。 披露する場所は、ロンドンにある「ジャパン・ハウス」。ジャパン・ハウスは、日本の魅力を対外的に発信する拠点で、 が世界の3都市に設けている。ロンドンのほかには、米国のロサンゼルスと のサンパウロにある。 ジャパン・ハウスでは1年を通して、常設展示や日本の の販売などを行っている。このたび、ロンドンのジャパン・ハウスが、日本の地域の魅力を伝えるイベントを募集。 の外郭団体・びわこビジターズビューローが、「ミニ・大津祭」として祭りを再現する企画を掲げて応募したところ、全国の中から選ばれたという。 披露するのは11月30日。この日は丸一日、ジャパン・ハウスを使用できる。祭りの再現は、曳山の一つ「月宮殿山(げっきゅうでんざん)」をもつ上京町の5人が担う。上京町は、 製で国の になっている「見送り幕」を所有している。曳山を飾るもので、その縁もあって大役を担うことになった。 再現はジャパン・ハウスのホ... ※無料期間中に解約した場合、料金はかかりません

title: Economic growth of India is better than that of China, says economist
content: Disputing a popular notion that the economic growth of China was faster than India’s, economist A.P. Tiwari said that the ground realities had proven otherwise to underline the robust growth of Indian economy. “There are many myths about the growth of China’s economy. The fact, however, is that the Indian economy is performing much better. Although the investment of the production activity in China is 42.4% of the GDP, the Incremental Cost Utility Ratio (ICUR) is very high at 8.1% resulting in a growth rate of only 5.2%. Though the investment in production activity in India is at the rate of 31.2% of the GDP in the production activity, the ICUR in India is only 4.5% and the growth rate was high at 7%,” Prof Tiwari said. He was delivering his keynote address at a national seminar on ‘An Ecosystem of Indian Entrepreneurship: A Probe’, organised jointly by the Sharnbasva University and the Sharanabasaveshwar College of Commerce at the Doddappa Appa Auditorium in Kalaburagi on Saturday. “India could do it because of its start-up culture. India is top in the world in establishing start-ups. The basic strength of the start-ups in India is the adoption of the notion small is beautiful which provides high labour absorption. The innovative business ideas generated by Indian entrepreneurs are better than others in the world. We need to take it forward. The budding entrepreneurs in the country should blend the time-tested traditional knowledge with creativity to achieve the desired...

title: Real Estate Investment Versus Other Popular Options Like Gold And Stocks: Which is better?
content: In Mumbai's dynamic economic environment, real estate has long been considered a reliable investment avenue. However, it is essential to weigh its pros and cons against other popular investments, such as gold and the stock market, to make informed decisions. Investing in real estate, especially in a city like Mumbai, offers tangible benefits. Real estate is known for its long-term capital appreciation and relatively stable returns compared to more volatile options like stocks. The demand for housing in Mumbai remains high due to continuous urban migration and development projects like the Mumbai Metro and Coastal Road, further increasing property values. One of the significant advantages of real estate is the ability to generate passive income through rentals. Mumbai’s rental market is buoyant, with residential yields averaging between 2-4% annually, depending on location. Additionally, property owners benefit from tax incentives such as deductions on home loan interest and rental income under Indian tax laws. However, real estate requires a high initial investment, making it less accessible for small investors. It is also a relatively illiquid asset, as selling property can take time and involves considerable transaction costs. Furthermore, maintenance costs, property taxes, and potential market downturns can reduce profitability. Gold Gold has traditionally been a favoured investment option in India, and Mumbai is no exception. It is viewed as a hedge against inflation and...

title: ‘Equine therapy is a godsend for my son — it has such an impact’
content: Mum says horse-riding lessons are a game changer for those with additional needs Ten-year-old Patrick McEntee pictured on therapy horse Bán. Photo: Frank McGrath Patrick's confidence is growing. Photo: Frank McGrath Ten-year-old Patrick McEntee has become very attached to his horse, Bán. He was diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) at age five and has undergone various therapies but his mother believes his weekly horse-riding lesson has been one of the most effective. Patrick has been attending the Equine Therapy Hub in Kilcloon, Co Meath, since July and has come on “leaps and bounds” since. “He’s always loved horses,” said mum Gillian. “Coming for his lesson up here, it’s the highlight of his week. It’s a great set-up and it’s had such a positive impact on him.” Patrick was impacted by the loss of his aunt last year and Gillian believes the equine therapy has helped him deal with this. It has helped him in many other ways, too. “His organisational skills have come on a lot. Every week he goes in, gets his helmet, his saddle, his bridle. This has helped him prepare for school every morning. He knows he has to make sure he has his schoolbag, his lunch, his coat. But the main thing I’ve noticed is the change in his confidence. Patrick can’t wait to go every week. He arrives up to the stables and says: ‘Hi guys, I’m here.’ He loves Bán.” I feel a lot of it is due to the confidence he’s gained from horse riding There...

title: Gregory Porter: ‘If my brother heard the song, he would be laughing at it, going: Why are you grieving over me?’
content: The multi-Grammy Award singer on how sadness and healing inspired last year’s single ‘Everything’s Not Lost’ BIRMINGHAM, ENGLAND - MARCH 29: Gregory Porter poses backstage during a Concert for Ukraine at Resorts World Arena on March 29, 2022 in Birmingham, England. All proceeds from Concert for Ukraine are being donated to Disasters Emergency Committee's Ukraine Humanitarian Appeal. (Photo by Tristan Fewings/Disasters Emergency Committee/Getty Images for Livewire Pictures Ltd) Last year, multi-Grammy Award winner Gregory Porter released Everything’s Not Lost , partly inspired by his brother’s death and the deaths of so many other people during the pandemic. “Help me to just pass this test of time,” he sang, “I wish that I was blind/Strange things to wish for/That I just can’t unsee all this misery...” Not untypically, he saw more than his fair share of misery growing up in a racist America. Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel Stay up to date with all the latest news

title: AI는 수익성 없다?...왜 논란 뜨겁나[AI 거품론2]
creator: 이현주 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]이현주 기자 = 미국 경기 둔화 가능성과 함께 인공지능(AI) 산업 거품에 대한 불안감이 사그라들지 않고 있다. 일종의 AI 회의론이 커지는 것으로 AI 빅테크들마다 수익성이 부족하다는 약점이 재차 불거지고 있다. 15일 업계에 따르면 미국의 빅테크 핵심 기업들을 일컫는 매그니피센트7(애플·마이크로소프트·알파벳·아마존·메타·테슬라·엔비디아)의 올 2분기 이익 증가율은 20%대에 그쳤다. 이는 전분기 대비 반토막 수준이다. 주요 외신들은 특히 향후 매그니피센트7의 실적 전망은 더 부진할 수 있다고 본다. 미국 벤처케피털 세쿼이어캐피털은 지난 6월 "빅테크의 연간 투자금을 회수하려면 올해 6000억 달러의 매출이 나와야 하지만 실제 매출은 최대 1000억 달러에 불과하다"고 강조했다. 전형적인 AI 비관론인 셈이다. 골드만삭스도 "AI 기술은 막대한 비용이 들지만 얻을 것은 별로 없다"며 회의적 시각에 불을 붙였다. 이런 주장을 뒷받침하듯 AI 반도체 대표기업인 엔비디아는 2분기 매출이 전년 동기 대비 122% 늘었지만 전분기 262% 성장에는 훨씬 미치지 못했다. 엔비디아의 이 같은 성장률은 최근 가장 낮은 것으로 시장 우려를 단적으로 보여준다. 반면 빅테크들의 AI 투자 확대 열풍이 계속되면서 궁극적으로 'AI 대세론'은 흔들리지는 않을 것이라는 상반된 전망도 나온다. 구글 등 11개 빅테크는 올해 AI 투자 규모를 전년 대비 20% 이상 늘릴 방침이다. 순다르 피차이 구글 최고경영자(CEO)는 지난 7월 2분기 실적...

title: Letters: Therapy needs to be provided to those dealing with the lasting scars of abuse
content: Unaddressed frustration and emotional pain is dangerous. Picture posed Sir — I recall an incident several years ago when a caller to the Liveline programme expressed shock and dismay at witnessing a nun being spat on outside the GPO in Dublin. The entirety of the programme was dedicated to disapproving remarks and critical commentary concerning the individual responsible for this act. I unequivocally reject any form of physical or emotional violence. However, my immed­iate response on that day was to question the underlying reasons. What experiences led this individual to such a state of distress that they acted in this manner? Yet, not one person challenged the dominant narrative of shock, disdain and judgment. Why not? Over the years, subsequent events may have provided greater context for, and understanding of, that incident. The recent Scoping Inquiry report, while deeply disturbing, represents only a fraction of our collective experiences. Evidence of profound societal trauma and suffering is pervasive. Symptoms such as severe anxiety, various forms of addiction and sudden outbursts of anger are just a few of the widespread indicators of our distress. We have yet to embark on a meaningful, healing journey. Perhaps we have now reached a moment where it is permissible to share our stor­ies of suffering, to have them heard, acknowledged and, most importantly, validated. This stands in stark contrast to the past, when those who bravely spoke out were often ignored,...

title: ‘Your ability in school is no reflection on what you can achieve in life,’ says hotelier John Brennan
content: Businessman rues loss of apprenticeships and push for third-level education as he discusses his dyslexia in RTÉ documentary Hotelier John Brennan says there is too much pressure on children to go to college. Photo: Valerie O'Sullivan Francis and John Brennan at The Park Hotel, Kenmare. Photo: Don MacMonagle John and Francis Brennan recently sold two hotels in Kenmare, Co Kerry — The Park and The Lansdowne ‘I was one of the first people to be diagnosed in Ireland in the mid-1970s,” says John ­Brennan, referring to his dyslexia. In a new RTÉ documentary, Lost For Words — inspired by a radio interview with the hospitality entrepreneur — he says the intense focus on academic achievement in children is wrong. The renowned hotelier also laments the loss of state apprenticeship programmes run by defunct bodies like Anco and Fás. Speaking on the phone from Kerry last week, he remembers being sent as a child to a “fella in Lad Lane” in Dublin to get privately assessed by his parents. “He had this little office there. When I went in, I went in stupid,” he says matter-of-factly. “That was that title on me. I came out with dyslexia. “It was the most exotic name you could ask for — I was thrilled. It’s an awful lot better than stupid.” While all his older siblings went to third-level education, he left school at 15 halfway through his Inter Cert exams after getting a job on a vegetable truck. “I could tell you if I’ll employ a person within two seconds of meeting them “So, as they...

title: CII-IGBC Launches 30th Chapter In Navi Mumbai, Aims To Promote Green Initiatives
content: The Confederation of Indian Industry-Indian Green Building Council (CII-IGBC) recently launched its 30th Chapter. The decision to open its next chapter in Navi Mumbai seems apt considering its 120+ green building projects covering over 610 million sq. ft. CII-IGBC's new chapter aims to support the city’s rapid urbanisation and ensure that its commercial and residential real estate development stays on a sustainable and eco-friendly path. Somnath Kekan, Assistant Director of Town Planning, Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation (NMMC) launched the Chapter in the presence of senior NMMC officials along with senior office-bearers from CII-IGBC as well as prominent builders, developers and architects from Navi Mumbai. IGBC launches its chapters with a vision to engage local stakeholders, raise awareness among citizens, and promote green initiatives that contribute to the city's sustainability and alignment with national goals. Speaking at the launch, C Shekar Reddy, National Vice Chairman, IGBC, said, “The Navi Mumbai chapter is our 30th Chapter and the fact that it was chosen reflects the city’s real estate potential in both the residential and commercial sectors. Additionally, the development of major infrastructure projects, such as the Navi Mumbai International Airport, is expected to boost economic activity, making it an ideal location for establishing an IGBC chapter. We are looking forward to working closely with the real estate stakeholders – builders, developers and...

title: هم‌گروهی والیبال ایران با فیلیپین تونس و مصر
creator: info@sharghdaily.com (sharghdaily)
content: والیبال ایران حریفانش را در رقابت‌های قهرمانی جهان ۲۰۲۵ شناخت. مراسم قرعه‌کشی والیبال قهرمانی جهان ۲۰۲۵ برگزار شد و تیم‌های حاضر در این رقابت‌ها حریفان خود را شناختند. رقابت‌های والیبال قهرمانی جهان ۲۰۲۵ قرار است به میزبانی فیلیپین برگزار شود. بر این اساس تیم ملی والیبال ایران در این رقابت‌ها با تیم‌های فیلیپین، تونس و مصر هم‌گروه شد. مسابقات والیبال قهرمانی جهان از ۱۲ تا ۲۸ سپتامبر سال آینده در فیلیپین برگزار می‌شود. این مسابقات برای اولین ‌بار با فرمت تغییریافته برگزار می‌شود و دو تیم برتر هر گروه به مرحله حذفی راه خواهند یافت. در مسابقات جهانی آتی دو تیم برای اولین ‌بار در این مسابقات حضور خواهند داشت؛ فیلیپین میزبان و کلمبیا. گروه‌بندی مسابقات به شرح زیر است: گروه A: فیلیپین - تونس- مصر - ایران گروه B: لهستان - رومانی- قطر- هلند گروه C: فرانسه - کره جنوبی- فنلاند- آرژانتین گروه D: آمریکا - کلمبیا- پرتغال- کوبا گروه E: اسلوونی- شیلی- بلغارستان- آلمان گروه F: ایتالیا - الجزایر- بلژیک- اوکراین گروه G: ژاپن - لیبی- ترکیه- کانادا گروه H: برزیل - چین- جمهوری چک- صربستان در سال ۲۰۲۳، تقویم فدراسیون جهانی والیبال تغییر کرد و تصمیم بر این شد که مسابقات جهانی هر دو سال یک بار برگزار شود.

title: Immigration boosts Bank of Ireland’s potential customer base, says CEO Myles O’Grady
content: Banking Bank of Ireland CEO Myles O’Grady. Photo: Naoise Culhane The high number of people moving to Ireland could boost Bank of Ireland’s potential customer base, the bank's CEO has said. Myles O’Grady, the BoI chief executive, made the comment during investment bank Barclays’ Global Financials Conference in New York last week. The inflow of immigrants to Ireland stood at 149,200 in the year to April 2024 Investment analysts at Barclays said O’Grady noted the Irish economy was resilient and growing – outperforming many eurozone countries, with supportive demographic trends. Among the positive demographic trends was the inflow of immigrants to Ireland, which stood at 149,200 in the year to April 2024 according to the CSO. O’Grady noted the inflow each year was providing a growing potential customer base for the bank, said the analyst note. ​O’Grady also said that growth in housing stock would support lending. Corporate sentiment had also improved after a period of significant deleveraging. Backed by lending growth, structural hedging and deposit growth, O’Grady also said he expected net interest income, a key driver of bank profitability, to be broadly stable next year. On competition, O’Grady believed it was natural to expect ongoing entrants to the market, given the attractiveness of the Irish banking backdrop. He said BoI would compete with these digital entrants, but would behave commercially, highlighting a strong track record of pricing discipline. O’Grady also...

title: ‘Not one shirt would fit me. I said, f**k that, this has to change’ — chef Kevin Dundon on his dramatic ‘life detox’
content: The celebrity chef reflects on his battle to lose three stone and the burnout he felt after the pandemic Kevin Dundon Interview Kevin Dundon is in flying form. He has just returned from Kerala in southern India, where he was on an extreme detox plan. He has, he says, “come back a new man”. The celebrity chef has shed three stone in just two months but, more importantly to him, he has turned his mental health around since hitting rock bottom at the start of the summer. He talks for the first time about how burnout led to him losing his passion for work and left him battling depression. title: Nisha’s Mumbai: Nisha JamVwal Writes About Her Divine Odyssey During Ganeshotsav
content: Many moons ago when I was still dating my husband I hopped in from Paris to meet him splat bang in the midst of Ganpati celebrations on the streets. As we wended our way from the airport to my aunt's home I made him stop en route to photograph the magical pageantry of some urchins dancing — legs in the air in every direction yowling in joy! ‘Ganpati Bappa Moriya, Pudhchya Varshi Lavkar ya!’ I found myself dancing with them to the utter amusement of the man who is now my husband! So many Mumbaikars complain about the noise and the traffic, but for me that initial allure of the joie de vivre of this festival is only enhanced over the years. Nostalgic flavour Everyone seems to be engaged in it so the term has lost usage, but earlier they used to term it 'jetsetting'! Earlier this week after a spell of such travel, I landed back and plonked into the auspicious Ganesh Chaturthi ambiance. First stop, a darshan at Tina Ambani and sister Bhavna Motivala's beautifully ornate Ganpati installation. Appropriately, two feet high majestic silver elephants decorated the entrance passage. A joyful meeting with Tina lent warmth as we reminisced our acquaintance for well over the past 25 years as we indulged in festive fare! To me she looks as lovely as then, and our mutual affection only adds to the charm. But we could spend just a brief interlude, as my 'darshan' invitation list was a longish scroll. Immersed in bhakti We were to be at Seema Singh's ceremonial aarti and glad to make it as...

title: 「五大名物」と「裏名物」に新しいメニューが9/25〜登場!【焼肉きんぐ】
content: 「焼肉きんぐ」は、9月25日(水)より、「五大名物」と「裏名物」をリニューアルした、グランドメニューの販売を開始します。 新しい「五大名物」 同店の看板商品「五大名物」に「【名物】厚切り上ロース〜ガリバタ醤油〜」と「【名物】ねぎポンで食べる大判サーロイン」が、新たに加わります。 厳選した肩ロースを豪快に厚切りにし、タレの味がしっかりと絡む様にスリットがいれられています。自慢のガリバタ醤油でたっぷりくぐらせて食べてみては。 柔らかさと赤身の旨みが特徴のサーロインを、大判にカットしました。炙り焼きしてねぎたっぷりのポン酢につけてお召し上がりください。 一頭から500g程しか取れない希少部位の名物商品! 肉味と脂の甘みが美味しいこだわりの逸品! 計算し尽くされた肉の厚みと自慢のすき焼きのタレの相性抜群。卵にくぐらせて食べると絶品です。 一本ずつ手切りしたお肉を、特製のたれに漬け込みました。長さ20センチ程のお肉を、豪快に焼き上げて堪能してみては。 「裏名物」バリエーション豊かに 「裏名物」がさらにバリエーション豊かになりました。新メニューの「石焼牛タンバーグ」は、和風ハンバーグソースで味付けした牛タンの入った粗挽きハンバーグを、熱々の石焼きで楽しめます。さらに、鶏肉の中でも珍しい部位を使用した「幻の鶏ハラミ」は、コリコリとした食感に、旨味も抜群です! 進化した焼肉きんぐを楽しんでみては♪

title: A Look At RERA Norms Applicable For Realtors And How These Benefit Home Seekers Or Sellers
content: The Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016, commonly known as RERA, was introduced by the Indian government to bring some much-needed transparency, accountability, and order to the real estate sector. Before RERA, buying a home in India could be a bit of a gamble. The industry was mostly unregulated, which often led to project delays, fraud, and a lot of stress for homebuyers. RERA was created to protect people’s interests and encourage more investments by laying down clear rules for developers, agents, and everyone else involved in the business. A quick heads-up: RERA only applies to new developments that are bought directly from builders or developers, meaning it doesn’t cover resale transactions in the secondary market. Also, smaller projects, like those with fewer than 8 units or on plots smaller than 500 square meters, are exempt from RERA regulations. RERA isn’t just for developers; it also sets out specific rules that real estate agents, brokers, and consultants need to follow. These rules are all about making sure agents do what’s best for their clients and keep things transparent. 1. Registration of real estate agents (Section 9) What this means: If you’re a real estate agent, you have to be registered with your State’s RERA authority. This is non-negotiable if you want to be involved in selling or buying property that falls under RERA’s scope. Why this matters: This registration process ensures that only qualified and trustworthy agents can operate. It...

title: Death of a GAA club: Despite all the goodwill and volunteers, eventually the numbers game becomes impossible to win
content: Photo: Ramsey Cardy/Sportsfile They did all they could to keep Shroid Slashers alive but for a long time the club teetered on the brink, living day to day. The few dedicated volunteers left would go into Longford town a couple of miles away and start knocking on doors looking for kids to play. Keeping them playing was the troublesome part and eventually the pool dried up. In recent years the club decided it was time to turn off the life support. The Slashers had been there for the best part of a century and won a junior football championship in 2009, reaching another final two years later. But for 20 years they had no reliable underage structure and no local primary school to draw from.
